dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi mai th+liM/ oM oM oM hUM oM saM ngo / /khro bo bcu po rnams kyi hUM ngo / /lha rnams kyi snying po'i sngags ni rdo rje phreng bar brjod do/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa dang kun du bzang po gnyis kyi gong du brjod pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ 'on kyang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang / pad+ma dang

dril bu dang / nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa/ rang 'dra ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas yang dag par 'khyud pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mA ma kI dang / phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang / gnod mdzes rgyal po rnams kyi ni mi bskyod

pa'o/ /spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang / byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo ba rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad do/ /sgra rdo rje ma dang nam mkha'i snying po dang / shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /gos dkar mo dang / dri rdo rje ma dang spyan

ras gzigs dang pad+ma mthar byed dang dbyug pa sngon po rnams kyi ni snang ba mtha' yas so/ /sgrol ma dang ro rdo rje ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / bgegs mthar byed dang / stobs po che rnams kyi ni don yod grub pa'o/ /rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rang

'od kyi yum dang bcas pa'o/ /dpal kun tu kha sbyor gyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor dang ri rab kyi steng du chos 'byung gi dkyil du gzhal yas khang ngo / /srung ba'i 'khor

lor gshin rje gshed phyag g.yas pa gsum gyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rnams bsnams pa/ g.yon gsum gyis snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab mthar byed ni rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang ral gri dang snying

gar sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma mthar byed ni lcags sgrog dang pad+ma dang ral gri dang / dril bu dang dgra sta dang zhags pa'o/ /bgegs dgra ni rdo rje dril bu dang rdo rje rgya gram dang 'khor lo dang / snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gtun shing dang

dgra sta'o/ /mi g.yo ba ni ral gri dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang dgra sta dang zhags pa'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po ni g.yas dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang rdo rje dang zhags pa'o/ /dbyug pa sngon po ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i

dbyug pa sngon po dang / ral gri dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang pad+ma dang dgra sta'o/ /stobs po che ni rtse gsum pa dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang / snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang pad+ma dang dgra sta'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba

ni g.yas dang cig shos kyi phyag dang po gnyis kyis spyi bor gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral gri'o/ /gnod mdzes ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang / snying gar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /bcu po

'di dag ni dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan pa 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa mi mgo'i phreng ba ske la 'chang ba go rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa

pa dang mi bskyod pa dang mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i sku mdog dkar po la cung zad dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa ral pa'i thor cog nag po la gnas pa'i nor bu dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang de'i 'og tu g.yon ngos su

gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dri ma med pa dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga dang gtsug gi 'khor lo dang / rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ske rags dang thal ba rnams kyis brgyan pa zhal gsum pa g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal sngon po dang dmar po zhal re re

la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa phyag drug pa rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bus rnam par mdzes pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud cing chu skyes la mnyam par sbyar ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa phyag g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags

pa 'dzin pa nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar dmar sems dpa'i skyil krung can sangs rgyas lnga'i cod

pan gyis spras pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa/ de'i thugs kar zla ba la ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang bzhin hUM nag po'i rnam pa'o/ /'dir sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag

nyid can rdo rje 'chang gi shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po zhi ba phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /lhor ni rin chen 'byung ldan ser po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis rin po che dang lcags kyu g.yon pa dag gis

thod pa dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /nub tu 'od dpag med dmar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis mda' dang pad+ma g.yon pa dag gis gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du don yod grub pa ljang gu phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang lcags kyu/ g.yon pa dag gis dril bu dang thod pa

'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du spyan ma dkar mo phyag brgyad ma g.yas rnams kyis 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis thod pa dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu rnams so/ /me ra mA ma kI sngon mo phyag bcu gnyis pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang

ral gri dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang / rin po che dang pad+ma'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang lcags kyu dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga'o/ /bden bral du gos dkar mo dmar mo phyag brgyad ma g.yas rnams kyis mda' dang pad+ma dang ral gri dang rdo rje rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams

kyis gzhu dang thod pa dang zhags pa dang / dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /rlung du sgrol ma ljang gu phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis ut+pal dmar po dang ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang mda'o/ /cig shos rnams kyis 'khor lo dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang gzhu rnams so/ /rim pa gnyis

pa la shar gyi phyogs su rdo rje drag mo dkar mo phyag na mda' dang lcags kyu dang gzhu dang byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rdo rje gzugs ma ser mo phyag na rdo rje dang / mdung dang zhags pa dang thod pa khrag gis gang ba'o/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ma dmar mo

phyag na ral gri dang rdo rje dang chus gang ba'i thod pa dang dril bu'o/ /byang du rdo rje zhi ba ma ljang gu ni phyag na tal pa thung ngu dang ba dan gsum pa dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang sman gyis gang ba'i thod pa rnams so/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje gnod sbyin ma ni dkar ser gyi mdog la phyag na dbyug to dang ut+pal

dang thod pa dang Da ma ru'o/ /mer rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dmar ser phyag na pad+ma dang me long dang rkang mar gyis gang ba'i thod pa dang dgra sta'o/ /bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma sngon dmar phyag na shak+ti dang dung dang 'khor lo dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'o/ /rlung dus rdo rje ma dkar ljang pad+ma dang rdo rje dang bdud rtsi

lnga dang sha lngas gang ba'i thod pa mi lpags kyis g.yogs pa dang dril bu'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni phyag bzhi pa dang po'i phyag mtshan gnyis ni g.yas pa dag gis 'dzin pa gzhan gnyis ni g.yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i shar du bzhad ma dmar mo phyag gnyis rdo rje dang rdo rje

dril bu dang bcas pas mngon par bzhad pa'i tshul can no/ /lhor sgeg mo sngon po phyag gnyis rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas snyems pa dang bcas pas mngon par sgeg pa'i tshul can no/ /nub tu glu ma ser mo ni sku cung zad g.yo zhing sgeg pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ting ting shag 'dzin pa'o/ /

byang du gar ma ljang gu pad skor gyi tshul la sogs pa'i gar gyis g.yo ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du gling bu ma dmar mo'o/ /mer pi wang ma ser mo phyag gnyis ma sgeg mo'i nyams kyis bag tsam lus g.yo ba'o/ /bden bral du mu kun+da ma

dkar mo'o/ /rlung du rdza rnga ma du ba'i mdog can no/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni phyag gnyis kyis rang rang gi rol cha brdung ba'o/ /de nas phyi'i snam bu la me'i mtshams su me tog ma dkar mo phyag g.yon gyis me tog gi phreng ba dang cig shos kyis 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du bdug spos ma

du ba'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis bdug spos kyi snod dang cig shos kyis rin po che 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du mar me ma gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon du mar me'i kong bu g.yas su pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du dri chab ma dmar mo phyag g.yon gyis dri'i dung chos dang cig shos kyis ral

gri 'dzin pa'o/ /shar gyi phyogs su me long ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis me long 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor ro ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu reg ma ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis gos sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du chos ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis

chos 'byung dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /'di rnams dang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni zhal gcig spyan gsum pa ral ba'i cod pan nag po la thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa/ lha'i na bza' gon pa skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /shar sgor

rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha'i mdog lta bu sngo bsangs zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang ral gri dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon rnams kyis zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub dang dril bu'o/ /lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma dkar ser zhal

g.yas nag po g.yon dmar po/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa'o/ /nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar po phyag drug

pa g.yas rnams kyis lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang lcags kyu'o/ /byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis dril bu dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis 'khor

lo dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa stag gi pags pa gon pa zhabs g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pas gar byed pa'i

tshul gyis sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang nyi ma'i gdan la'o/ /lha gzhan thams cad ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'o/ /thams

cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od zer can kho na'o/ /'dir rdo rje sems dpa' kho na shes rab dang bcas pa ste/ lha gzhan thams cad shes rab ma dang bral ba'o zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go/ /rang lta bu'i shes rab ma dang bcas pa zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni rdo rje

sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mA ma kI dang sgra rdo rje ma dang glu ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o/ /spyan ma dang rdo rje drag mo dang sa'i rdo rje ma dang me tog ma dang / bzhad ma dang gling bu ma dang rdo rje lcags kyu ma rnams kyi rnam

par snang mdzad do/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje sku ma dang rdo rje bdug spos ma dang / sgeg mo dang pi wang ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma rnams kyi rin 'byung ngo / /gos dkar mo dang rdo rje chags pa ma dang / mar me ma dang dri chab ma dang mu kun+da ma dang lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so/ /sgrol

ma dang rdo rje zhi ba ma dang rdo rje gnod sbyin ma dang / gar ma dang ro ma dang / rdza rnga ma dang dril bu ma rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o/ /thugs ka'i sa bon ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams dkyil 'khor lo dgod pa'i rim pas/ hUM bruM/ AM hIHkhaM b+h+rUM/ hUM hrIHtaM aM AM iM IM uM UM aM AHraM hAM/ IM rAM laM

d+haM liM/ gaM baM liM naM raM/ oM oM eM aiM dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i sngags ni oM badzra a mr-i ta ma hA su khaM haM swA hA zhes pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sngags oM AHbadzra g+haN+De hoHhaM swA hA zhes pa ni las thams cad pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ni 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i snying po'i

sngags nyid kyis lha gzhan rnams kyi snying po'i sngags kyis bsgrub bya yang 'grub par 'gyur bas de rnams ni ma bris te gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas so/ /de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma yang rig par bya'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang

sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gdugs dkar po dang bcas pa'i seng ge la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo'o/ /'di'i cod pan dar gyis bcings pa'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa sangs rgyas lnga 'od 'phro bas brgyan

pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal khro zhing gad rgyangs dang bcas pa/ g.yas dkar ba bzhad pa dang bcas pa/ g.yon dmar ba sgeg pa dang bcas pa/ zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag gsum na steng du bstan pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang dgra sta dang rdo rje'o/ /g.yon gyi gsum

la dril bu dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang ral gri rnams so/ /'di'i shar gyi phyogs su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /byang phyogs su 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi mdog can no/ /nub tu ro langs ma dmar mo'o/ /lho phyogs su gtum mo sngon mo'o/

bzhi po 'di dag kyang seng ge la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis steng du bsgreng pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du seng ge mo ni seng ge'i gdong pa can g.yas ser g.yon dkar ba'i lus phyed phyed pa glang po

che dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su stag mo stag gi gdong pa can g.yon sngon mo g.yas dkar ba phyed phyed kyi sku rin po che bdun gyi phung po la gnas pa'o/ /srin po'i mtshams su ce spyang ma ce spyang gi gdong can g.yas dmar ba g.yon nag po'i lus phyed phyed pa ma he la

bzhugs pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su 'ug pa mo 'ug pa'i gdong can g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i lus phyed phyed pa ser po dang dmar po'o/ /klu brgyad kyi gzhug ma rnams la bzhugs pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub dang

bcas pa'i rdo rje zhags pas brgyan cing sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /de'i shar sgor rgyal ba'i dbang phyug ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis thal mo khar bcug pa'o/ /byang du gsal byed ma ser mo mar me lta bu'i thal mo kha sbyar ba spyi bor 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu 'jigs byed

ma dmar mo khrag gis gang ba'i snyim pa steng du byas te kha'i thad kar bzung nas khrag gi rgyun 'thung bar byed pa'o/ /lhor kam+po dzi nag po rdo rje'i snyim pa la mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis phan tshun sbyar te sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi rtse mo brkyang ba sbyar nas rang gi gsang ba'i gnas ston par

byed pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i yi dwags kyi snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni zhal gcig la spyan gsum pa'o/ /lha mo bcu gsum po thams cad kyang lha'i gos dmar po mnabs pa dbu

la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa sems dpa'i skyil krung can klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bskal pa'i mtha'i me 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'jigs par byed pa go rims bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin

chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang / rnam snang dang rin 'byung dang snang mtha' dang / rtag pa dang 'od dpag med dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ AM IM UM r-IM l-IM aiM auM AH'di rnams ni thugs ka'i sa

bon rnams so/ /oM hrIHswA hA/ zhes bya ba ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM be tA lI hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni ro langs ma'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o// //bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dkyil na gnas

pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i ro'i snying gar gnas pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'i steng du nyi ma la kye'i rdo rje rnam pa gsum mo/ /bzhi pa la ni ro dang bral ba'o/ /de la 'jig rten gsum kun du bskyod pa nag po sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra kham ser

gyen du brdzes pa thod pa lnga dang phyag rgya drug dang / mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /rgyab kyi char stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can zhabs g.yon pa'i brla la g.yas pa'i zhabs kyi rtse mo yang dag par bzhag pa'i skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa zhal gcig phyag

gnyis pa phyag g.yon pas thod pa khrag gis gang ba rdo rjes mtshan pa 'dzin pa/ 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyis bdag med ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyug pa brdeg pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o/ /yang na phyag bzhi pa phyag gnyis pa lta bu phyag gzhan gnyis kyis

bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje phag mo la yang dag par 'khyud pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par ro/ /yang na phyag drug pa nag po zhal gsum pa nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ zhal re re la spyan gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa phyag g.yas pa rnams ni rdo rje dang mda' dang rtse gsum

pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dril bu dang gzhu dang thod pa'o/ /rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la 'khyud pa ste/ gzhan ni ji ltar rigs par snga ma bzhin no/ /he ru ka 'di gsum gyi shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje lha

mo la sogs pa brgyad do/ /de dag gi phyi rol du dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang mu kuN+Da ma dang rdza rnga ma rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnams so/ /lha mo

bcu drug po 'di rnams ni gang bzhin te/ yab dang bral ba'o/ /he ru ka gsum gyi rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa'o/ /thugs ka'i sa bon hUM ngo / /snying po'i sngags ni oM AHhUM hrIHswA hA/ so so'i sngags ni rim pa bzhin du oM trai lokyA k+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM hUM hUM phaT

swA hA/ oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes so/ /kye'i rdo rje bzhi pa ni phyag bcu drug pa mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa bdag med pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa/ 'on kyang 'di la gong du bshad pa'i ro'i gnas su bdud bzhi ste/ de la phung po'i bdud kyi rang bzhin tshangs pa ser po/ nyon

mongs pa'i bdud khyab 'jug nag po/ 'chi bdag gi bdud dbang phyug chen po dkar po/ lha'i bu'i bdud ni brgya byin kham ser ro/ der bcom ldan 'das zhabs bzhi ba'i zhabs gnyis kyis rdo rje'i skyil krung phyed pa rang gzhan gnyis kyis ni g.yon bskum pa dang g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs

pa/ sku mdog nag po dang sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa nas stag gi pags pa'i bar du sngar bshad pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhal brgyad pa spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal nag po gad mo can g.yas pa dkar po g.yon dmar po steng du gnas pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa lhag ma rnams ni

nag po'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag rnams ni rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo dang thod pa dang dbyug pa dang rtse gsum pa dang lcags kyu rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams su dril bu dang pad+ma dang gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga bsgreng ba dang thod pa dang rin po che dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa'o/ /shar

gyi 'dab mar gau rI dkar ser phyag g.yas pa gnyis na mda' phyung ba dang rdo rje gri gug go/ /g.yon gnyis na gzhu dang nya ro hi ta dang bcas pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'o/ /lhor tsau rI dmar mo rdo rje dang Da ma ru dang lcags kyu dang phag pa dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba'o/ /nub tu

ro langs ma ni sku mdog dkar ser ral gri dang rus sbal dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang chang gis gang ba'i thod pa dang dri chus gang ba'i thod pa'o/ /byang du g+hasma rI ljang gu cung zad ser ba rkang mar gyis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang rdo rjes

mtshan pa'i me thab dang dgra sta'o/ /dbang ldan du puk+ka sI ser mo shas gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i seng ge dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang dpag bsam shing gi yal ga dang rin po che'o/ /me'i mtshams su sha ba rI dkar mo byang chub sems kyis gang ba'i thod par gnas pa'i dge slong dang rdo rje dang kha

T+wAM ga dang zhags pa'o/ /srin po'i mtshams su tsaN+DA lI sngon mo g.yas su khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa la stag dang g.yon du pad+ma dkar po dang phyag gnyis na rlung ras so/ /rlung gi mtshams su DoM bi nI nag mo chang gis gang ba'i thod pa dang rtse gsum pa gyen du bstan pa dang bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i thod pa la

gnas pa'i ce spyang dang gshol lo/ /de dag gi phyi'i zur rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi snga ma bzhin du'o/ /shar gyi sgo ru rta gdong ma nag mo zhal rnams nag mo dang dkar mo dang ser mo dang steng gi rta gdong ljang gu'o/ /lho ru phag gdong ma ser mo zhal rnams ni ser mo dang nag mo dang

dkar mo'i steng du phag zhal dmar po'o/ /nub tu khyi gdong ma dmar po zhal rnams ni dmar mo dang nag mo dang dkar mo'i steng du khyi gdong ser po'o/ /byang sgor seng gdong ma ljang gu zhal rnams ni ljang gu dang nag mo dang dkar mo'i steng du seng ge'i gdong pa dmar po'o/ /'di ltar rtsa ba

dang g.yas pa dang cig shos dang steng gi rim pas zhal bzhi pa'o/ /sgo skyong ma rnams phyag bzhi pa rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i ro'i steng du g.yas bskum pa dang g.yon brkyang bas

gnas pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa'o/ /lha gzhan rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang zhal re re zhing spyan gsum pa phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa yab med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo / /snying po'i sngags ni/ oM de wa pi tsu badzra

hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa'o/ /g+hasma rI'i oM oM swA hA/ zhes pa ni las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar bdag med pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs

kyi pad+ma'i 'dab mar rdo rje ma dang gau rI ma dang chu ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ /rim pa gnyis par sna tshogs pad+ma rnams la shar la sogs par gau rI/ tsau rI be+e tA lI g+hasma rI rnams so/ /dbang ldan la sogs par puk+ka sI dang sha ba rI dang tsan+Da lI dang DoM bi nI rnams so/ /bdag med ma'i steng gi

shar ngos kyi pad+ma la gnas pa'i mkha' spyod ma steng zhal can no/ /'og gi nub ngos kyi pad+ma la gnas pa'i sa spyod ma 'og zhal can no/ /'dir phyi ma la gnas pa'i gau rI la sogs pa brgyad ni phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor lta bur ser po la sogs pa'i mdog can no/ /gzhan bdun

ni sngon mo'o/ /bco lnga po yang skyil krung phyed pas ro'i snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dmar ba dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can phyag bzhi pa g.yas dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug go/ /

g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang / gyen du bsgreng ba'i kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /zur rnams la gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar gyi sgor rta gdong ma dkar sngo/ lhor phag gdong ma ser sngo/ nub tu

khyi gdong ma dmar sngo/ byang du seng gdong ma ljang sngo/ bzhi po 'di dag kyang g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum gyis nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa ming gis rjes su mthun pa'i zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis gnyis dang ldan pa'o/ /

'di dag gi khyad par ni bdag med ma dang mtshungs pa'o/ /bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams la go rims bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang / rtag pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha'

yas dang rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa dang stag gdong ma la sogs pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang

don yod grub pa rnams kyis so/ /bdag med ma'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni AM/ oM aM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni g+hasma rI'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /yang na bdag med ma la sogs pa lha mo bco lnga'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la lha mo thams cad sku mdog nag mo g.yas g.yon

gyi phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa mchod phyir thogs pa 'dra ba'i kha T+wAM ga dang bcas pa'o/ /gzhan rnams ni gong ma bzhin no/ /oM AHbadzra g+hasma rI oM hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni g+hasma rI'i sngags so// //gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ku ru kul+le dmar mo phyag bzhi ma g.yas

gnyis kyis mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis kyis ut+pal la dmar po dang gzhu 'dzin pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa snang ba mtha' yas kyis rigs kyi bdag po byas pa/ rdo rje ma la sogs pa bcu bzhi sku mdog dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa bco lnga po

thams cad kyang pad+ma dmar po dang ro'i snying gar zla ba la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'o/ /ku ru kul+le'i snying ga'i sa bon ni hrIHoM ku ru ku l+le hrIHswA hA/ zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sngags so/ /gzhan ni sngar bzhin du ste de'i tshe ku ru kul+le'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor

la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'brur zla ba la dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa me tog phri yang ku lta bu ljang ser/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gsum me tog pri yang

ku lta bu ljang ser dang dkar po dang dmar po sna tshogs pa'i lag gdub dang rkang gdub la sogs pa dang gos rnams kyis brgyan pa phyag drug pa rdo rje dang dril bur bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang ral gri/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis zhags

pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa 'od dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can zhi ba dang sgeg pa'i nyams kyi tshogs can no/ /shar gyi 'dab mar zhi ba mo dkar mo zhal gsum ni dkar ba dang nag pa dang dmar ba'o/ /lhor zhi gdong ma ser mo zhal gsum ni ser po dang / dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /nub tu zla ldan ma dmar mo zhal

gsum ni dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'o/ /byang du ri bong can ma ljang gu zhal gsum ni ljang gu dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /me'i mtshams su zla dkyil ma sngon mo zhal gsum ni sngon mo dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /bden bral du zla tshes ma me tog pri yang ku lta bu ljang ser

mo zhal gsum ni ljang ser dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /rlung du yid 'ong ma ut+pal sngon mo'i mdog can zhal gsum ni sngon mo dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /dbang ldan du yid tshim byed ma gser gyi mdog can ma zhal gsum ni ser po dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ lha mo 'di rnams ni dkyil

'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag mtshan lta bu 'dzin pa'o/ /'on kyang 'khor lo'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /zla tshes ma ni zla ba'i cha gcig 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan gyi mtshams su me tog ma dkar po ni zhal gsum pa dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'o/ /

mer bdug spos ma du ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa du ba'i mdog dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'o/ /bden bral du mar me ma gser gyi mdog can ma zhal gsum pa gser mdog dang dkar po dang nag po'o/ /rlung du dri chab ma dmar mo zhal gsum pa dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'o/ /

'di rnams ni go rims bzhin du g.yas kyi dang pos me tog gi za ma tog dang spos phor dang mar me'i mchod sdong dang dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag lhag ma rnams kyis gtso bo'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang mu kun+da ma dang rdza rnga ma rnams ni

dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang du ba'i mdog can gyi zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis kyis gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor khro gnyer rim par ldan ma sngon po nam mkha' lta bu sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum mo/ /lho'i sgor 'jigs sdigs dkar po

'jigs su rung ba dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum mo/ /nub sgor rta'i gzugs can dmar mo dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal gsum mo/ /byang sgor tshogs kyi gtso bo ljang gu ljang gu dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum pa'o/ /'di dag ni 'gying ba'i khro bo 'gying ba'i stang stabs kyis

bzhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /khyad par ni g.yas dang po'i phyag gis rim pa ji lta bar lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pa mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'o/ /'dir dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i gzugs brnyan ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga

dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa'o/ /de las gzhan pa'i lha nyi shu pa rnams ni rdo rje dang bdud rtsi dang po tis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo lta bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sogs

pa'o/ /me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis pa rnams kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni haH'o/ /oM haHbadzra a mr-i ta swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sngags so/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid yin no/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhan rnam pa

gsum po 'di ltar bsgom pa'i khyad par gyi rim pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud nyid las shes par bya'o/ /mangs pas 'jigs pas 'dir ma bshad do// //dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dgyes pa rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang

ngo / /phyag bcu drug pa la slar yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu srung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa yang yod do zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang du gan rkyal du gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang

dbang phyug dang / lha'i dbang po ste/ bdud rnam pa bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi snying gar gnas pa'i nyi ma la zhabs bzhi pa gcer bu gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa/ zhabs gnyis kyis skyil krung phyed pa dang / zhabs gnyis kyis g.yon bskum pa dang / g.yas brkyang ba'i gar gyi tshul gyis

gnas pa dang spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa dpral ba'i steng du pags pa dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po lngas brgyan pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ sku mdog nag po phyag bcu drug pa zhal brgyad pa/ zhal re re la dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum

yod pa rtsa ba'i zhal nag po g.yas pa rnams ni dkar po dang nag po dang nag po'o/ /g.yon pa rnams ni dmar po dang nag po dang nag po'o/ /steng gi zhal ni du ba'i mdog can mi sdug pa zhal thams cad ni smin ma kyog po dang bcas pa khro gnyer can mche ba'i myu gu gtsigs pa g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad

kyis bsnams pa'i thod pa rnams la glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang / glang dang rnga mo dang mi dang shar b+ha dang byi la rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag brgyad pa'i thod pa rnams ni sa dang chu dang rlung dang me dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams so/ /gtsug gi 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul

rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags dang thal ba rnams dang mi mgo rlon pa khrag 'dzag pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba dang dpung rgyan dang rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'di'i yum bdag med ma nag mo gcer bu gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par 'khyud pa/ g.yas

bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba'i gar gyis gnas pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa zhal gcig pa stan gsum pa dmar la zlum pa mche ba gtsigs pa dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du mdzes pa/ dpral ba'i mtshams su thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ mgrin par mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba 'phyang ba dang / rkang gdub la sogs

pas brgyan pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang drag po'i snying ga'i steng du zla ba rnams la gau rI la sogs pa'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar gnas pa'i gshin rje dang lus ngan dang srin po dang / thags bzangs ris kyi snying

gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i puk+ka sI la sogs pa'o/ /de la gau rI nag mo g.yas na gri gug g.yon na ro hi ta'i nya 'dzin pa'o/ /tsau rI dmar mo g.yas Da ma ru g.yon phag pa 'dzin pa'o/ /ro langs ma gser gyi mdog can g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rus sbal dang pad+ma'i snod 'dzin

pa'o/ /g+hasma rI ljang gu phyag g.yas pa na sprul g.yon pa na rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa'o/ /puk+ka sI sngon mo phyag g.yas pa na seng ge g.yon pa na dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /sha ba rI dkar mo phyag g.yas pa na dge slong g.yon pa na gsil byed 'dzin pa'o/ /tsaN+Da lI nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs ma phyag g.yas

pa na 'khor lo g.yon pa na gshol 'dzin pa'o/ /DoM bi nI khra mo phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje g.yon pa sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /khyad par gzhan ni sngar brjod pa'i bdag med ma bzhin no/ /he ru ka dang bdag med ma dag gi rigs kyi bdag po mi

bskyod pa'o/ /gau rI la sogs pa rnams ni mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas so/ /puk+ka sI la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo / /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag gnyis pa g.yas pas rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba g.yon pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa 'dzin pas bdag

med ma la 'khyud pa kha T+wAM ga dpung pa g.yon pa la brten pa'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag bzhi pa sngon po phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pas thod pa khrag gis gang ba 'dzin pa phyag lhag ma dag rang dang mtshungs pa'i rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo phyag drug pa

sngon po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal gsum sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ phyag g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug dang g.yon pa dag gis rtse gsum pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa rnams

bdag med ma dang mtshungs par yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhabs kyis gsungs so/ /phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa 'di rnams sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la ro'i snying gar nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pas gar mdzad pa mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du

brdzes pa mi mgo lngas dbu brgyan pa/ smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa phyag bcu drug pa bzhin du gtsug gi 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa gau rI la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /lha mo thams cad ni thal ba dang bral ba'o/ /rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje lu gu

rgyud ma ni mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo / /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ /zhes bya ba ni phyag bcu drug pa'i snying po'o/ /oM trai lo kyA k+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni phyag gnyis pa'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'o/ /

oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag drug pa'o/ /oM AHbadzra g+hasma rI oM hUM swA hA zhes bya ba ni g+hasma rI'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o// //sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang na gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ngo / /kha cig ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung

med par gzhal yas khang ngo zhes so/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ze 'brur nyi ma la sgyu ma chen mo las byung ba'i he ru ka nag po nyi ma lta bu'i 'od zer can 'bar ba'i phreng ba du mas 'khrigs pa 'gying ba'i khro bo dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa thod pas brgyan

pa'i cod pan can rtsa ba dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'o/ /zhal re re la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa phyag bzhi pa'i g.yas gnyis na thod pa dang mda'/ g.yon gnyis na kha T+wAM ga dang gzhu 'dzin pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa mi'i

pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa/ skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog dmar mo gtso bo lta bu'i phyag mtshan can phyag gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'khyud pa/ dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje

mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal rdo rje dang thod pa dang dril bu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang ljang gu'i zhal rin po che'i pa tra dang tri shU la dang mgrin pa btsir ba'i ce spyang dang ba dan 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu

pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu'i zhal sna tshogs pad+ma dang mda' dang thod pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu dang ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po'i zhal lo/ /ral gri dang Da ma ru dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /

thams cad kyang phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ zla ba'i gdan la 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /'di rnams kyi khyad par gzhan rnams ni gtso bo lta bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyang go rims ji ltar rnam snang dang / mi bskyod pa dang

rin chen 'byung ldan dang ngag gi dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo / /oM hUM hUM snying po'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang oM oM hUM/ oM hUM hUM/ oM swA hUM/ oM AHhUM/ oM haM hUM/ sna tshogs mkha'

'gro ma'i sngags ni las thams cad pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang gi chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /de'i ze 'bru la ro'i snying gar nyi ma'i gdan la shes rab ma dang bral ba'i

bcom ldan 'das sku mdog la sogs pa phyi nas 'chad pa'i 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thod pa bzhin no/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i 'dab ma la rim pa ji lta bas sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og na gnas ma dang legs bzangs mo rnams ni sku mdog sngon mo

g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can phyag g.yas gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa g.yon gnyis kyis kha T+wAM dang Da ma ru 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang / rlung gi 'dab ma la chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha' la gnas ma

rnams ni ser mo na bza' ser po gon pa 'od zer ser po 'phro ba zhabs gnyis kyis g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis gri gug dar Da ma ru/ g.yon gnyis kyis kha T+waM ga dang pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag kyang

nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu mgul du 'phyang ba mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la mi

bskyod pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas lngas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rnam snang dang rin 'byung dang snang mtha' rnams kyis so/ /chang 'tshong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang de dag rnams so/ /yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha mo rnams kyang

mdog dkar mo mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dmar po 'di ni yum dang bral ba'am yum dang bcas pa'o/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ngo / /de'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du 'jigs byed dang dus mchan g.yon bskum

g.yas brkyang bas mnan pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo ni bskal pa 'jig dus me lta bu'i 'od zer 'bar zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu bsal bar mdzad pa sku mdog sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal rtsa

ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi mi sdug pa gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa rab tu gtum pa ljags 'dril ba 'jigs su rung ba'i zhal gsum pa re re zhing spyan gsum gsum pa dmar la zlum pa smin ma g.yo ba khro gnyer dang bcas pa/ dpral ba'i steng na thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/

khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba yum dang bcas pa klu mtha' yas sngon pos dbu skra 'bar zhing dmar ser gyen du bcings pa/ klu 'jog po dmar pos rna rgyan byas pa/ klu pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos mgul rgyan byas pa/ klu karko Ta dUr ba lta bu ljang

gus mchod phyir thogs byas pa nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byas pa/ pad+ma dkar po kun da'i me tog lta bur mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa/ dud skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa/ rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ rdo rje sems dpas dbu la rgyas btab pa/ rdo rje dang

dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rang gi yum la snyoms par zhugs pa gang sa gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha T+waM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po sngon po dang ser

po dang ljang gu ni rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /g.yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje thob dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha T+rAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje nyi ma ser po ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /khyad par du

phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ khyad par du rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams kyang rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o/ /'og nas 'chad pa rnams kyang de ltar shes par bya'o/ /byang du rdo rje gtsug tor dmar po dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /pad+ma dmar pos mtshan pa'i phyag go/ /lhor rdo rje

'khyil ba ljang gu ni ljang gu dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal lo/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag go/ /mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du ba'i mdog du ba'i mdog dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /srin por rdo rje bdud rtsi dmar po dmar po dang / ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo/ /

dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du nag po chen po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal tri shU la 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba nag po nag po dang / ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa brgyad po 'di rnams ni rim pa ji lta bar gshin

rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang pad+ma mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang stobs po che dang mi g.yo ba rnams kyi ming gzhan no/ /steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur pa dkar po dkar po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /

'og tu rdo rje sa 'og gnod mdzes kyi ming rnam grangs can sngon po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal rol pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /'di'i phyag gnyis kyis klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang kha T+wAM ga'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khro bo 'di

rnams ni phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas mtshan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang mtshungs pa'i yum dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o/ /dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'khyil ba rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzes par brgyan pa smin ma g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs

pa'i zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa dmar zhing zlum pa mi mgo'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgyad dang steng du tshangs pa dang 'og tu thags bzangs ris rnams la g.yas brkyang gis mnan nas

bzhugs pa rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan pa ste/ ji ltar 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lor bshad pa bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo / /oM kha badzra d+h+r-ika badzra hUM ka ra badzra hUM phaT ces bya ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi snying po'i sngags

so/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags ni oM badzra kuN+Da li badzra hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o/ /yang shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams la g.yas skor gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu'o/ /'di rnams kyi gnas

dang sku mdog la sogs pa bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no/ /yang na 'jam pa'i rdo rje srung ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu pa bzhin no/ /yang na kun du kha sbyor gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /phyogs 'di gsum ka la yang oM AHbig+hA takr-i ta

hUM zhes bya bas bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad pa'o// //bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba'i steng du

nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mo g.yas brkyang gi zhabs gnyis kyis mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das sku mdog nag po shar dang byang la sogs pa'i zhal bzhi nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa stag gi pags pa'i sham

thabs can/ phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rgyab tu glang po che dkar po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa brgyangs nas 'dzin pa/ de las gzhan pa'i g.yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis Da ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gug dang

rtse gsum 'dzin pa/ g.yon rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang rdo rje zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so/ /mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i mi'i rgyu mas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ dpral ba'i steng

du thod pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nor bu dang g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog nag po rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig phyag

gnyis spyan gsum pa skra'i tshogs grol ba gcer bu thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags bcings pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gis bzung ba'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba 'dzag pa'i rgyun gtso bo la stob pa/ sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa rdo rje steng du 'phyar ba'i phyag g.yas pas gdug pa rnams la sdigs par

byed pa khrag dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa cung zad bzhad pa zla mtshan 'bab pa dang bcas pa spu gyen du langs pa'o/ /de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la g.yon skor gyi dang / me la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams la

g.yas skor gyis dgod do/ /de la phyogs kyi 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang / lA mA dang / dum skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma rnams ni nag mo dang ljang gu dang dmar mo dang / ser mo'i mdog can rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba phyag bzhi ma g.yon pa gnyis kyis kha T+wAM ga

dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa dag gis Da ma ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa rnams so/ /mtshams kyi 'dab mar byang chub kyi sems dang khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga rnams grub pa'i bcud lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur bas gang ba'i pad+ma'i snod rnams so/ /

yang na bzhi char yang bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'o/ /de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs su thod pa'i dam bu dang rab tu gtum mo'o/ /byang du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /nub tu keng rus dang 'od ldan ma'o/ /lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma'o/ /mer chang

dgra ma dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o/ /srin por 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma'o/ /rlung du rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje'i lus dang shing grib ma'o/ /rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang sa srung ma'o/ /rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen

mo'o/ /dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad dang chang 'thung ma'o/ /rdo rje bzang po dang lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o/ /rdo rje 'od dang shin tu bzang mo'o/ /'jigs byed chen mo dang rta rna ma'o/ /mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o/ /de bzhin du sku'i 'khor lo la stobs po che

dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma'o/ /rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma'o/ /nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal he ru ka dang shin tu bzang mo'o/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur

ma'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo'o/ /de la thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dpa' bo rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can dpral bar gnas pa'i rdo rje phreng bas mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs can phyag bzhi pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje

dril bu g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga dang g.yas pa Da ma ru bsnams pa/ tshangs pa'i skud pa dang dpung rgyan can mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o/ /rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag po'i gzugs can ma

dbu skra grol ba'i gcer bu ma/ phyag gnyis pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gis thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa gdug pa rnams bsdigs pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo rnams la khwa gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin no/ /khyad

par du 'di rnams kyi zhal ni ming gi rjes su mthun pa'o/ /mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje pho nya ma dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i zhal lo/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs kyi lha mo gnyis kyi g.yas dang g.yon gyi sku phyed phyed 'dra

ba'o/ /brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdan can no/ /DA ki ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni mi mgo'i phreng ba can rdo rje phreng bas dpral bar brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ska rags la sgra dang bcas pa'i g.yer ga la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mi

bskyod pa'o/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad do/ /DA ki ma la sogs pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan dang / thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lor gnas pa rnams ni mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rtag pa rnams so/ /dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams ni don yod grub

ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo / /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM khaN+Da ro he hUM hUM phaT ces bya ba ni dum skyes ma'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /lha gzhan rnams kyi ni kho bos dpal bde mchog gi mngon par

rtogs pa'i sgrub thabs su bshad pa'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar thams cad ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa de la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lngas 'khyud pa'i g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ DA ki ma la

sogs pa bzhi dang khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni g.yon pas thod pa dang dpung pa la brten pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang g.yas pa DA ma ru 'dzin pa gzhan thams cad ni gong bzhin no/ /yang na 'dir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa phyag gnyis pa nyid kyis phyogs la dpal bde mchog dang rdo rje

phag mo gnyis kyis gser gyi mdog gam sngon pos yang ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g.yas pas rdo rje gsor ba la mchog tu brtson pa g.yon pas thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'am/ yang na rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pas gnas pa'o/ /DA ki ma la

sogs pa bzhi ni ser mo g.yas pa DA ma ru 'dzin pa rnams so/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams nag po rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa dpa' mo rnams dkar mo phyag g.yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can rnams so/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po pad+ma dang

pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /DA ki ma rnams ni nag mo phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni dmar mo g.yas pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i 'khor

lo 'dzin pa rnams so/ /dpa' bo thams cad ni yum la 'khyud par brtson pa g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa rnams so/ /dpa' mo rnams ni de'i brla gnyis la 'khril ba'i tshul lo/ /khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni g.yas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo thams

cad ni g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa ni g.yas pas DA ma ru g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mi mgo 'dzin pa'o/ /DA ki ma la sogs pa rnams dang khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yon pa'i dpung pa la kha T+wAM ga'o/ /bcu gnyis po 'di

rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa khyad par gzhan thams cad ni gong bzhin no/ /'di ni bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum mo// //gang gi tshe 'di rnams la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga mi bsgom par rdo rje phag mo dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor

gsum mo/ /rdo rje phag mo'i snying ga'i sa bon ni baM mo/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM hUM phaT ces pa ni snying po'o/ /bde mchog gi phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa lha 'di rnams kyi phyag g.yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan ni bri bya'i dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya'o// //bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod

pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dbus su gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa nag po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi ze 'brur ro/ /gan rkyal gyi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcom ldan

'das dpal he ru ka sku mdog nag po skyil krung phyed pa gar gyi nyams dgus gar byed pa zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na DA ma ru dang gri gug g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag rgya drug pa mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i

phreng ba mgrin pa la 'phyang ba/ gnyis 'thung gi pags pa'i sham thabs cung zad rgyab na nyil ba sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral ba'i thor cog nag po can dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lngas brgyan pa sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can no/ /mnga' bdag 'di'i btsun mo ni sna

tshogs sde ma gcer bu mi mgo'i phreng ba can skra sil bur 'gro zhing gyen du 'bar ba thod pa lngas dbu brgyan pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma/ yab kyi mgrin pa la chags pa'i phyag g.yon pas thod pa khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa

yab la stob pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis gri gug brdeg pa'i tshul lo/ /shar gyi rtsibs nag po'i steng gi 'dab ma la legs phreng can ma'o/ /byang du thod pa can ma'o/ /nub tu 'jigs can ma'o/ /lhor mi thub ma'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la g.yas

skor gyis byang sems dkar ba dang dmar ba dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron me lngas gang ba'i thod pa rnams so/ /rim pa dang po 'di ni rdo rje phreng ba sngon pos bskor ba'o/ /de nas rim pa gnyis pa ni rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad kyi phyi rim rdo rje dmar po'i phreng bas bskor

ba'o/ /de'i shar gyi rtsibs la dge ba'i ska rags ma'o/ /byang du ni gzugs can ma'o/ /nub tu rnam rgyal ma'o/ /lhor 'dod can ma'o/ /dbang ldan du dus can ma'o/ /mer ni mtsho chen ma'o/ /bden bral du byed ma'o/ /rlung du gsod ma'o/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa

la ni 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad de rdo rje dkar po'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /de'i shar gyi rtsibs la sgrol ma'o/ /byang du 'jigs mthong ma'o/ /nub tu legs mthong ma'o/ /lhor thub dka' ma'o/ /dbang ldan du dge

ma'o/ /mer grib non ma'o/ /bden bral du dus mtshan ma'o/ /rlung du grags chen ma'o/ /shar gyi sgo'i pad+ma la mdzes ma'o/ /byang gi sgo'i pad+ma la nor 'dzin ma'o/ /nub sgo'i pad+ma la skal bzangs ma'o/ /lho sgo'i pad+ma la mthong na yid 'ong ma'o/ /'di rnams thams cad g.yas

g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa so cung zad ston pa zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mi mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba/ dbu skra sil bu dmar ser gyi tshogs gyen du brdzes pa byang sems 'dzag pa nyi ma'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyi tshul

gyis gnas pa rnams so/ /sgo skyong ma rnams ni g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba'o/ /thams cad kyang stag gi pags pa gyon ma sku mdog sngon mo'o/ /yang na legs phreng can ma la sogs pa bzhi nag mo'o/ /rim pa gnyis ma la gnas pa rnams dkar ser ro/ /rim pa gsum

pa la gnas pa rnams ljang gu ma'o/ /sgo'i lha mo rnams nag mo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sna tshogs sde ma ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /legs phreng can ma la sogs pa bzhi ni rin 'byung gis so/ /rim pa

gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams ni snang ba mtha' yas kyis so/ /rim pa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /sgo'i lha mo rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi snying ga'i sa bon ni hUM ngo / /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AHhI heHhUM phaT snying po'o/ /sngags

'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor 'di'i las thams cad pa'o// //dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte ba la

gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dkyil du dbus kyi rim pa'i lte bar seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' nag po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal gsum nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po

zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa dpral bar gnas pa'i thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa nag po'i cod pan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba'i dbu rgyan can stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs rgyab tu

cung zad nyil ba/ phyag drug pa rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ye shes kyi DA ki ma nag mo'am dkar mo la 'khyud pa/ lag pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang mda' 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis pad snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas shar gyi re mig la glang po che'i

rgyal po la 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i rdo rje DA ki ma dkar mo/ byang du rma bya la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i 'jigs byed DA ki ma ser mo sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ nub tu bya khyung la tsog pur gnas pa'i ro langs ma dmar mo/ lhor khol po'i gdan la byin pa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i gtum

mo sngon mo dbu skra dmar po 'gram par grol zhing spyi bor thal mo sbyor ba'o/ /'dir ye shes kyi DA ki ma la sogs pa lnga ni g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams ni glang po che la sogs pa la gnas pa'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas

pa glang po che'i pags pa smad la gon pa mi'i pags pa stod la gon pa'o/ /dbang ldan du seng ge la 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas ba'i seng ge ma dkar ser phyag gnyis ma g.yas pas steng du 'phyar ba'i kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /mer

rdo rje phag mchu ma zlum po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'i stag mo kha dog dkar nag mo phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa dang cig shos kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ma he la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa ce spyang ma ce spyang gi gdong can sku mdog dmar nag dgra sta dang zhags

pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis so/ /rlung du ce spyang gi gdan la tsog pur bzhugs pa'i 'ug pa ma 'ug pa'i gdong can dmar ser mo phyag gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /'di rnams ni rang rang gi chibs rnams la pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o/ /shar du rdo rje

DA ki ma'i rgyab tu DA ki ma dkar mo phyag gnyis rtse mo khar bcug pa'o/ /byang du 'jigs byed DA ki ma'i rgyab tu mar me ma ser mo spyi bor mar me lta bur thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas pa'o/ /nub tu ro langs ma'i rgyab tu 'jigs byed ma dmar mo snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba zhal du gsol ba'o/ /lhor gtum

mo'i rgyab tu kam+po ji nag mo/ phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar gtun shing 'phyar ba'o/ /bzhi po 'di rnams pad+ma dang nyi ma dang ro la gnas pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje phreng ba dang 'od zer gyi zlum po'i rim pa bskor ba la pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su puk+ka sI dang DI mi DI dang gtum mo rnams phyag gnyis

kyis bdud rtsi'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du 'jigs byed ma dang grags ma dang sha ma rnams ni sha lngas bkang ba'i pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu drag shul ma dang 'bar ma dang mi sdug ma rnams gtor ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma dang bum pa ma rnams btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /

dbang ldan du sgeg mo snyems pa'i phyag rgya can dang dri chab ma dri'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su pi wang ma pi wang bsgreng ba dang me tog ma me tog 'thor ba'o/ /bden bral du glu ma kha'i thad kar mdzub mo g.yo ba dang / bdug spos ma spos dang bcas pa'i spos phor 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du gar ma

gar gyi tshul gyis steng du thal mo sbyar ba dang / mar me ma mar me dang bcas pa'i mar me'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes DA ki ma la sogs pa'i lha mo sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di dag ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba/ dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can no/ /'jigs byed DA ki

ma ni dbu skra gyen la brdzes ba/ seng ge ma la sogs pa ni gos dmar po gyon pa'o/ /puk+ka sI la sogs pa dang me'i mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dkar mo'o/ /'jigs byed DA ki ma la sogs pa dang dbang ldan gyi lha mo dag ser mo'o/ /drag shul ma la sogs pa dang rlung mtshams kyi lha mo dag

dmar mo'o/ /thod pa ma la sogs pa dang bden bral gyi lha mo dag nag mo'o/ /de nas rdo rje phreng ba zlum po'i phyi rol gyi rim pa'i sgo rnams dang snam bu rnams la chu skyes dang zla ba'i gdan rnams so/ /de la shar sgor khyab 'jug nag po dang / byang du tshangs pa ser po dang / nub tu dbang phyug chen

po dkar po dang / lhor gdong drug dmar bo dang / dbang ldan du dbang po ser po dang / mer lus ngan ser po dang / srin por gshin rje nag po dang / rlung du chu lha dkar po'o/ /lha'i snam bu la shar du keng rus 'jigs byed dang kha T+wAM ga'i srin po dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / dril bu'i rna ba

can rnams dkar po'o/ /byang du gtum mo'i dbang phyug dang mdun sa'i lha dang rigs kyi dbang phyug dang / dz+haM gar 'jigs su rung ba rnams ser po'o/ /nub tu drag po'i 'dod pa dang Sha Na Di la'i dbang phyug dang Da ma ru'i 'dul byed dang rnga sgras 'jigs byed rnams dmar po'o/ /lho ru tum

bu ra'i dbang phyug dang s+thA ra na dang / mche ba gtsigs pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa rnams ni nag po'o/ /khyab 'jug la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis kha T+wAM ga dang rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis lha

mo la 'khyud pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /ral pa nag po'i thor gtsug can rnams thod pa lnga'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can no/ /'di rnams kyi yum lha mo rnams kyang phyag g.yas pa dang cig shos kyis kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin

pa'o/ /'dir dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa'o/ /ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma la mi bskyod pa'am/ rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyas btab pa'o/ /rdo rje DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi la rtag

pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa rnams kyis so/ /seng ge ma la sogs pa bzhi ni mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas rnams kyis so/ /tshangs pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyis

so/ /dbang phyug chen po la snang ba mtha' yas kyis so/ /lha gzhan dkar po rnams la rnam par snang mdzad kyis so/ /ser po rnams kyi ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis so/ /dmar po rnams la snang ba mtha' yas kyis so/ /nag po rnams la mi bskyod

pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi snying ga'i sa bon hUM ngo / /oM hUM haHswA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags so/ /oM g+huM g+haHswA hA/ ro langs ma'i las thams cad pa'i sngags so zhes bya ba ni/ rim pa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang lta bu la

DA ki ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams ni sgo rnams su'o zhes pa gzhan no/ /rim pa gnyis pa yang gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs so zhes pa ni gzhan no/ /de yang zlum po'o zhes bya ba ni kha cig go// //bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi dbus su chos 'byung gi lte

bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs mtsho skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du gnas pa'i ma he nag po khros pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i gshin rje'i gdan la g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang pas mnan nas bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed

nag po smin ma dang ag tshom gyen du langs shing dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba dregs pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba/ ljags 'gyu ba mche ba 'bar ba gtsigs pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal nag po dang

dkar po dang dmar po/ phyag drug pa gri gug thod par ldan pa'i g.yas dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ g.yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa gnyis na 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba bzhin du

mtha' yas la sogs pa'i klus brgyan pa'o/ /'di'i shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po ste/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang cig shos kyi zhal dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po phyag g.yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na rin po che dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs

su rin chen 'byung ldan gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu zhal gsum ser po dang sngon po dang / dkar po g.yas kyi phyag dag na rin po che dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa dag na 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po zhal gsum dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'o/ /

g.yas pa dag na pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs su phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang gu zhal gsum ljang gu dang nag po dang / dkar po g.yas pa dag na 'khor lo dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag na nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi char yang /

khro bo 'khor lo'i bdag po'i mtshan nyid can g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing rang dang 'dra ba'i yum la 'khyud pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su rdo rje tsa rtsi ka ma ni skem zhing / gzugs dang phyag mtshan rnams ni gti mug gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /bden

bral du rdo rje phag mo phag zhal can ma zhe sdang gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /rlung du rdo rje dbyangs can ma 'dod chags gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /dbang ldan du dkar po phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra'i rtsa ba rnams su'o/ /

rdo rje'i ra mtshams rnams su rdo rje tsa rtsi ka la sogs pa bzhi ni rang 'od dang 'dra ba'i thabs dang bcas pa'o/ /shar sgor tho ba gshin rje gshed nag po zhal gsum ni nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /g.yas dag gis rdo rje tho ba dang ral gri/ g.yon dag gis nor bu dang pad+ma

'dzin pa'o/ /lho sgor dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dkar po zhal gsum dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'o/ /g.yas pa dag gis dbyug pa dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub sgor pad+ma gshin rje gshed 'dod chags gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /byang

sgor ral gri gshin rje gshed phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu la cung zad sngo ba'o/ /thams cad kyang ma rungs pa 'jigs pa gad rgyangs can dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyen la brdzes shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing rang 'od kyi

shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /lha gzhan rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i

thod pa bzhi ni byang sems dkar ba dang dmar ba dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lngas bkang ba'o/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i rigs kyi bdag po ni spyi bor mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid do/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi yang de bzhin no/ /de rnams ni go rims ji lta bar spyan ma la

sogs pa bzhi dang tho ba gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni yaM ngo / /oM hrIHSh+T-iHbi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po sngags dang las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o// //rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje

gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi dkyil du gzhal yas khang gi lte ba la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje sgrol ma gser btsom lta bu sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang rgyab dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi gser mdog dang dkar po dang sngon

po dang / dmar po phyag brgyad ma g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang mda' dang dung rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis ut+pal ser po dang gzhu dang lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub po/ /shar gyi 'dab mar me tog sgrol ma dkar mo ni phyag gnyis kyi me tog gi phreng ba

'dzin pa/ lhor bdug sbos sgrol ma nag mo ni phyag gnyis kyis bdug spos 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ser mo ni phyag gnyis kyis mar me'i gong bu 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du dri'i sgrol ma dmar mo ni phyag gnyis kyis dri chab kyi dung 'phyar ba'o/ /lha mo bzhi po 'di rnams ni zla ba la

gnas pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mdog lta bu 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma dkar mo ni g.yas pa na lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ma ser mo ni phyag

g.yas pa zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo ni lcags sgrog la rdo rjes mtshan pa phyag g.yas su'o/ /byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu ma ni phyag g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma rnams

la spyan ma la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i byang sems kyi bum pa dang / ri rab dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o/ /steng du gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo ni 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i phyag g.yas pa'o/ /'og tu gnod mdzes ma sngon mo ni g.yas pa klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /

lha mo drug po 'di rnams ni phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o/ /bcu po 'di rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o/ /bcu gcig po rnams kyang zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa gser gyi rna cha g.yo bas brgyan pa gos sna

tshogs dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa pad+ma rA ga'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /rdo rje sgrol ma'i rigs bdag ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams te rdo rje lcags kyu

ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo / /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rin 'byung ngo / /gnod mdzes ma'i mi bskyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying ga'i sa bon ni tAM ngo / /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA zhes pa ni snying po'i sngags dang las thams cad pa'i yang sngags so// //'od

zer can ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi nang du gzhal yas khang ngo / /kha cig gi lugs la chos 'byung med do/ /ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ngo zhes so/ /gzhal yas khang gi lte bar mchod rten gyi phug gi dkyil du sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas

pa'i zla ba'am nyi ma la g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ma ser mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi cod pan can dbu skra la mchod rten gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa rtsa ba'i zhal ser po

g.yas dkar po g.yon zhal nag po phag pa'i zhal khros pas khro gnyer dang zur mig dang ldan pa/ ljags 'dril ba 'jigs par byed ma phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang rdo rje dang khab 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang skud pa dang / mya

ngan med pa'i shing me tog dang bcas pa'i yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /smad gos sngon po gyon pa stod g.yogs rnam par bkra ba'i gos sngon po can/ gser mdog lta bu'i phag pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa rang gi mdog lta bu'i phag pas yongs su bskor ba/ mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi phreng

ba dbu la brgyan pa/ shar phyogs su arka ma sI zhes bya ba me tog ban+du ka'i mdog lta bu khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi phyag go/ /lho ru marka ma sI zhes bya ba'i lha mo gser gyi mdog lta bu'i g.yas pas skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang / g.yon pas mya ngan med pa'i

shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu an+ta ra d+h+waM na ma sI ser mo ni g.yas pa mya ngan med pa'i yal ga g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du ni ra ma sI zhes bya ba sku mdog dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams

la sogs par u da ya ma sI dang / gul+ma ma sI dang / ba na ma sI dang / tsI ba ra ma sI rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du arka ma sI la sogs pa'i mdog dang phyag mtshan bzhin no/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i shar gyi snam bu la ma hA tsI bar ma sI dang / ba rA ha mu khi ni nag mo mche ba

gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba/ g.yas pa rdo rje lcags kyu dang g.yon pas rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru pa dA kra ma sI dang ba rA li ser mo ni g.yas pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang g.yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pa ra kra ma sI dang bi da li dmar mo ni g.yas

pa dang g.yon mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du Ur ma sI dang / ba rA li ljang gu khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa dang g.yon gyi phyag go/ /me'i mtshams su ba tA li dmar mo g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ba dA li ser mo ni

g.yas pa skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang g.yon pas yal 'dab dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du ba rA li sku mdog dkar mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du bA rA ha mu khi dmar

mo ni phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor A lo dang tA lo dang kA lo dang sats+tsha lo sam+pa ta mur+d+hi TI rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu phyag gnyis ma rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin

pa'o/ /arka ma sI la sogs pa'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams ni mngon par gsar du byung ba'i lang tsho can mchod rten gyis dbu la brgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa phag zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa gser

mdog lta bu'i phag pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ldan pa gser mdog lta bu'i phag pa la chibs pa'o/ /sgo skyong ma rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la g.yon bskum pa g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa'o/ /gzhan nyi shu po ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bas

gnas pa'o/ /'od zer can ma'i rigs bdag brtag pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la gnas pa rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams su yang de bzhin no kha cig go/ /

yang na dkar po rnams la rnam snang nag po rnams la mi bskyod pa/ ser po rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan/ dmar po rnams la snang mtha' ljang gu rnams la don yod grub pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan no/ /'od zer can gyi snying ga'i sa bon ni mAM ngo / /oM mA rI n+ya swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po'i

sngags so/ /oM mA rI ts+yai hUM sarba big+h+nAM utsha d+ha ya hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la bcom

ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo ni 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i zhal ser po g.yas dkar po nub sngon po g.yon dmar po'o/ /g.yas pa rnams kyis rin po che'i pa tra dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang mda' dang

ral gri dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang rtse gsum pa dang / gzhu dang dgra sta dang dung rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /dbul mchod rten gyis brgyan pa rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma'o/ /de'i shar phyogs su stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ni sna tshogs

pad+ma dang zla ba la rol pa'i kun nas bskyod pas bzhugs pa sku mdog dkar po zla ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g.yas sngon po rgyab ser po g.yon pa ljang gu'o/ /de'i g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang mchog

sbyin pa dang lcags kyu dang mda' dang ral gri rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa dang gzhu dang dgra sta rnams so zhes bya ba'i phyag bcu'o/ /lho ru sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od can gyi gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo

ni rdo rje skyil krung can ma nag mo nag mo dang dkar po dang dmar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag bcu gnyis pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ gzhan rnam pa gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas

pa'i gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang / mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / gzhu dang rin po che'i pa tra dang pad+mas mtshan pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma

la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od can gyi bsil ba'i tshal chen po ni dmar mo dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po dang rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag brgyad pa'i g.yas rnams kyis pad+ma dang bcas pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang

mda' dang rdo rje dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang snying gar gnas pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la zla ba'i 'od can sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ rma bya chen mo

ljang gu ni ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rma bya'i gzhug sgro dang mda' dang mchog sbyin dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis lhung bzed la gnas pa'i dge slong dang gzhu dang pang du gnas pa'i bum

pa rin po che 'bar ba 'bab pa can dang / sna tshogs rdo rje la rin po ches mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la me'i mtshams su nag po ni phyag gnyis kyis dung 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du dus mtshan ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin

pa'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rna ba nag mo dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis dgra sta 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dkar mo sku mdog dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o/ /dgu po 'di dag ni rat+na sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang

gos dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas

dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang / rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi yang sngar bzhin no/ /so sor 'brang ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bon ni praM ngo / /

oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni ma hA pra ti sA re hUM hUM phaT phaT ces bya ba ni snying po'o/ /sa bon ni bruM mo/ /oM AHma hA sa hA sra pra marda ni brUM hUM snying po'o/ /sa bon hUM ngo / /oM AHma hA man+t+ra a nu sA ri ni hUM hUM snying po'o/ /sa bon ni dzrIM ngo / oM AHma hA shi ta pa ti badzri hUM snying po'o/ /sa bon ni maM ngo / /oM ma hA

mA yU ra bid+ya rA dz+nyI hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pa snying po'o/ /dgos pa'i dbang gis 'di rnams gang yang rung bas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug ma'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil

'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du gling dang nye ba'i gling phran dang rgya mtsho dang ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng gzhal yas khang ste de'i dbus su seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa nyi

ma'i 'od can/ sangs rgyas lngas spras pa'i rat+na'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can rat+na sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos dang ldan pa zhi ba'i zhal bzhi dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang / phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i

byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /gzhan gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /yang na 'di ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po

rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo langs pa la g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la sems ma rdo rje ma sngon mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa g.yon pas

sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i rin po che 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs par byed pa'i sdigs mdzub po/ /nub tu chos kyi rdo rje ma dmar mo ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma

brgyad pa dkar dmar g.yas pas 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub sdigs par byed pa'o/ /de nas shar phyogs
