su glang po che'i dbang po'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa/ phyag g.yas pa gung mos rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po bzung nas sa gnon gyi tshul byed cing phyag g.yon pa gan rkyal du pang du bzhag pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje sems

dpa' dkar po phyag g.yas pa'i gung mos snying gar 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje gsor ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa'o/ /lhor rdo rje rgyal po ser po g.yas par gnas pa'i rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul byed

cing phyag g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /kha cig ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pas 'gugs pa'i tshul byed pa'o zhes so/ /byang du rdo rje chags pa dmar po phyag g.yon dang cig shos rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje legs pa margad kyi

mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul byed pa'o/ /lhor rta'i rgyab tu sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che gung mos bzung ste mchod sbyin gyi tshul

byed pa/ g.yon pa mnyam bzhag go/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje rin chen ser po ni g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' gnyis la rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'ching bar byed cing g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu snyems pa dang bcas pas

dkur brten pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po snying gar phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'i nyi mas gsal bar byed pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje tog ljang gu g.yon gyi bar du lhur gnas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing 'phyar ba'o/ /nub tu rdo rje bzhad pa dkar

po g.yas pas so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas kyang de bzhin te so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis khar bzhag pa'o/ /nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la snang ba mtha' yas rdo rje skyil krung can dmar po phyag g.yon pa dang cig shos gan rgyal du byas

pa phang pa'i steng du bzhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i g.yas pa'i gung mos rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje chos dmar skya g.yon pa 'gying ba'i tshul dang bcas pas pad+ma'i yu ba 'dzin cing g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje rnon

po nam mkha' lta bu sngon po g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pusti 'dzin pa g.yas pas ral gri 'phyar ba'i tshul du 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje rgyu gser btso ma'i mdog can g.yon par gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa g.yas pa'i gung mo mgal me lta bu bskor zhing

chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje smra ba dmar po g.yon pa chos kyi dung dang g.yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du khyung gi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar don yod grub pa ljang gu rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i gung mos sna tshogs

rdo rje 'dzin pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul byed cing g.yon pa gan rkyal du pang bar bzhag pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje las ljang gu g.yas pas snying gar bslang ba'i sbyor bas sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dkur

brten pa/ yang na lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rdo rje bsrung ba ser po phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje'i go cha 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po phyag gnyis kyis mthe chung gnyis kyi rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon gyi rtse mo gnyis rang gi khar

bcug pas gdug pa rnams sdigs par byed pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje khu tshur ser po khu tshur gyi mtshams su rdo rje ste/ rdo rje khu tshur dag gis bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsdams pa'o/ /dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i pad+ma rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje dkur brten pa'i phyag rgya'i

phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du pad+ma la phreng ba ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis rat+na'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du pad+ma la glu ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi rgyud sbreng ba'o/ /dbang ldan du pad+ma la gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis bzung

nas phyag gnyis kyis gar byed pa'o/ /dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi ru snam bu la shar du pad+ma rnams la byams pa dang mthong ba don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams ni mi bskyod ba lta bu'o/ /lhor pad+ma rnams la spos kyi

glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / ye shes tog rnams ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o/ /nub tu pad+ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang / zla ba'i 'od dang bzang skyong dang dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni 'od dpag med lta bu'o/ /byang du pad+ma rnams la rdo rje snying po dang / blo

gros mi bzad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kun du bzang po rnams ni don yod grub pa lta bu'o/ /yang na shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa stong du bzhis mtshang ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i mtshan rnams

mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do/ /me'i mtshams su pad+ma la rdo rje bdug sbos ma dkar mo dang bden bral gyi pad+ma la rdo rje me tog ma ser po dang / rlung gi pad+ma la rdo rje mar me ma dkar dmar dang / dbang ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu/ bdug spos ma la sogs pa 'di

rnams gang bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo'i pad+ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams rim pa bzhin du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams ni gong bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /

'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan pa'i lha rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gos dang rat+na sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rat+na'i cod pan can rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma gtogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' bcu drug ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du phyogs pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi lha rnams ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la gnas shing nyi ma'i 'od zer can no/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa lnga las gzhan pa'i lha bzhi bcu zhe brgyad ni sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings rnam par snang mdzad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid la rang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o/ /

me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i rigs kyi bdag po ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /sems ma rdo rje ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang sgeg mo dang bdug spos ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje

lcags kyu rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o/ /rin chen rdo rje ma dang rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang / phreng ba ma dang me tog ma dang spos kyi glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /chos kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang glu ma dang / mar me ma

dang / 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so/ /las kyi rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa bzhi dang / gar ma dang dri chab ma dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o/ /'dir nang

gi gzhal yas khang gi sgo rnams su'ang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa sgo skyong bzhi bsgom par bya'o zhes pa phyogs gzhan no/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying ga'i sa bon AHoM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA yo gI shwa ra hUM zhes pa ni snying po'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las

thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /gang yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud gzhan gyis kyang lha'i rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa de ni 'dir mangs kyis dogs pas ma bshad do// //bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang la sogs

pa gzhal yas khang bar du dang por bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /'on kyang 'dir khro bo rnams ni 'og nas 'chad pa'i gzugs can no zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go/ /rdo rje gur gyi nang na ri rab kyi steng na sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gzhal

yas khang zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /phyogs gnyis ka la yang mchod rten dkar po'i nang du gzhal yas khang ngo / /de'i lte ba la seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje

sku mdog gser bco ma lta bu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gtsug phud can gsum gyis rnam par brgyan pa rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyi ral gri dang / mchog sbyin dang mda' dang / g.yon pa

rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu sti dang chu skyes sngon po dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bdag lta bu'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de'i shar phyogs kyi le tshe la glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa sngon po 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa

rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa'i gung mos snying gar rdo rje gyen du bsgreng ba/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu dku la brten pa/ g.yas gzhan rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda' rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams

kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru rta'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis mnyam gzhag gi

phyag rgya byas la/ g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas pa'i snang ba mtha' yas dkar po dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar

po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa g.yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma'i yu ba snying gar bzung ste/ g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du khyung

gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la don yod grub pa sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa kha dog dmar po dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis

kyis ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du spyan ma ser mo ni sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs

mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / rin po che'i snye ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /mer mA ma kI sems dpa'i skyil krung can ma sngon mo ni khro ba dang bcas pas dgod pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs

mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du gos dkar mo dmar po ni phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin cing 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o/ /rlung du sgrol ma margad lta bu'i mdog

can ma sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang ut+pal dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su sems ma rdo rje ma

dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams rim pa bzhin du sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhin no/ /'on kyang nu ma 'dzin pa med pas sems ma rdo rje ma rin chen rdo rje ma las kyi rdo rje ma rnams sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o/ /chos kyi rdo rje

ma ni zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du tsun+da dkar mo zla ba'i mdog can phyag nyi shu rtsa drug ma rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dang / g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang ral gri dang rat+na'i phreng ba dang bi dza pU ra dang mda' dang dgra sta dang mdung thung dang thob dang

lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang ba dan gsum gyi tshul dang bgrang phreng ngo / /g.yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / pad+ma dang spyi blugs dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang shag ti dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sdigs mdzub dang bum pa bzang po dang bi di ba la dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'i po ti'o/ /kan dzI ka'i stod g.yogs bcings pa bla gos phrag pa la gzar ba gar gyi nyams dgu'i rang bzhin rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g.yas pa'i sngon po ljags 'gul zhing mche ba bag tsam gtsigs pa/ g.yon pa ser po ma mchu mnan pa/ thal mo sbyar te mdzub

mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs par zlum po'i rnam par bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i rtsa ba'i logs la gzhag par bya ste/ snying gar bzhag pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mer ni rin chen skar mda' ser mo phyag drug pa gnyis kyis snying gar rin po che kha sbyor 'dzin pa'o/ /

g.yas pa gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mda' 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du khro gnyer can dkar mo phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang spyi blugs

dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ljang gu phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang mda' 'dzin pa g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni rol pa'i kun

du bskyod pa dang ldan pa zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor du shar gyi snam bu la byams pa gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag dang po gnyis chos 'chad kyi phyag

rgya dang / g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang g.yon pa me tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /'jam dpal ni brjod zin pa'i gzugs can te/ khyad par du shes rab ma dang bral ba'o/ /spos kyi glang po ljang gu g.yon pas bum par gnas pa'i glang po che'i

sna 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas kyi mchog sbyin no/ /ye shes tog ser po g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas mchog sbyin no/ /lho ru bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po/ /g.yon pa rat+na 'dzin pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /blo gros

rgya mtsho dkar po phyag gnyis kyi sor mo thams cad brkyang bas chu rlabs kyi tshul byed pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa gser gyi mdog lta bu g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag ste/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa ljang gu g.yon pas khu tshur mkhal khung du

bzhag pa'o/ /g.yas pas se gol gtogs pa'o/ /nub tu mthu chen thob dkar po g.yon pas bag tsam kha phye ba'i pad+ma dkar po'o/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdig pa sprug pa'i tshul lo/ /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges

par 'joms pa'i blo gros gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag gnyis kha sbyar brdabs pa'i tshul lo/ /dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g.yon pas ut+pal la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /byang du zla 'od sku mdog zla ba'i 'od lta bu g.yon pas ut+pa

lar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /'od dpag med dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nam mkha' mdzod sku mdog gser lta bus g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur 'gying pas dkur brten pa/ g.yas pas nam mkha'

la bskor ba'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po'am dkar po g.yon pas sa la reg pa/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe bong dang sdigs mdzub sbyar te/ dri ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams ni zla ba'i gdan

dang zla ba'i 'od can no/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa spyan gsum pa rang phyogs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa/ gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /byams pa dang 'jam dbyangs gnyis

la ni mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya med do/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha thams cad gos sna tshogs pa dang rin po che'i rgyan dang ral ba'i thor tshugs dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor ma he'i steng du gshin rje mthar byed nag po phyag

drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pas zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gyen du bsgrengs pas sdigs par byed pa/ g.yon pa'i gnyis pas 'khyud pa'i lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o/ /de yang zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa sku

mdog dkar po g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa phyag g.yas pas yab la 'khyud par brtson pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i gsum pas dngul gyi gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /margad lta bu'i lha mo ljang gu phyag gnyis ma g.yas ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa phyag g.yon pa yab kyi ske la 'khyud pas

g.yas phyogs su brgyan pa/ zhal drug pa gsus pa 'phyang ba/ zhal drug ni sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal dgyes pa'i gad mos bzhad pa/ gnyis pas 'jigs par byed pa/ gsum pa'i zhal gdangs pa/ bzhi pa 'jigs su rung ba/ lnga pa rdo rje mche ba can/ drug pa mgo'i steng du

gnas pa ljags 'gul ba'o/ /yang na steng gi sngon po rtsa ba la sogs pa'i zhal rnams ni g.yas skor gyis sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams so/ /lho sgor gzhan gyis mi thub pa ser po ser po dang nag po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /

phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug tho dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rta mgrin dmar po dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag drug pa

g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang ka na ya dang mda' rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sngon po rkang pas bgegs mnan pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis

ral gri dang dgra ste dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rat+na'i ri bo'i steng du mi g.yo ba sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang zhags

pa dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon ngos su 'phyang ba'i gos sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags 'gul ba'i zhal gdangs pa'o/ /mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po phyag

drug pa dang po gnyis kyis rang gi phyag rgya byas pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang g.yon pa gnyis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyab sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te sdigs mdzub gnyis phyir brkyang nas zhags pa'i tshul byas pa ni 'dod pa'i

rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /bden bral du dbyug pa sngon po sku mdog sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda'/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du stobs po che sngon po phyag brgyad pa

g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang ral gri dang mda'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang tho ba dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi

phyag rgya bcings pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis ral gri dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba ni gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'og tu rdo rje sa 'og sngon po phyag drug pa

g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bgegs mthar byed la sogs pa bdun po ni sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po rtsa ba dang g.yas g.yon gyi zhal gsum

mo/ /khro bo bcu yang khros pa'i lta stangs can spyan dmar po smin ma g.yo ba bag tsam rtsa ba'i zhal kha phye ba/ g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs ba/ g.yon pa'i zhal ma mchu mnan pa mche ba gtsigs pa stag gi pags pas smad dang stod la gon pa thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan

pa/ dbu skra 'bar ba gyen la bcings shing 'khyil ba sma ra dmar ser rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pa can/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ phud kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang bcas pa'i gdengs ka can rnams kyis 'jigs pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i gdan la g.yon brkyang

bas gnas pa'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed ni g.yas brkyang ba'am rdo rje skyil krung gis kyang bzhugs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la gnod mdzes rgyal po'i gzugs kho nas rnam par gnas pa'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor nyid du tha dad du ma

bshad de/ dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las rnal 'byor rgyas par bstan pa la'o/ /'bring bor bstan pa la ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyi bo'i steng na rat+na'i ri la gnas pa'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa'i gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po ser po dang sngon po

dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag brgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /

sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan can/ ral pa'i thor cog gi cod pan can gzhogs gnyis su spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po rnams kyis brgyan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rnal 'byor rgyas pa la/ yang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur

ba ni dkyil 'khor ba tha dad du dang de'i steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig go/ /lha gzhan bzhi bcu zhe gsum po rnams kyang zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa'o/ /'dir nu ma 'dzin par bstan pa de yang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi bdag lta

bu'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyi'o/ /khro bo rnams kyis ni bdag lta bu'i shes rab ma g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o zhes shes par bya'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed las gzhan rnams la shes rab ma med kyang de'i nu mar 'dzin

pa'i tshul gyis bdag gi nu mar 'dzin pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan no/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa/ me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mi

bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang / spyan ma dang tsun+da rnams la 'jam pa'i rdo rjes rgyas btab pa/ mA ma kI dang sems ma rdo rje ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang / khro bo bcu la mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa/ rin chen rdo rje ma dang rin chen skar mda' ma dang /

bzang skyong ma la sogs pa bzhi la rin 'byung gis rgyas btab pa/ gos dkar mo dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang khro gnyer ma dang mthu chen thob la sogs pa bzhi la snang ba mtha' yas kyis rgyas btab pa/ sgrol ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang / zla 'od

la sogs pa bzhi la don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar sa bon ni muH'o/ /oM AHzhes pa snying po'i sngags so/ /oM A mr-i ta kuN+Da li big+h+nA n+ta ka hUM zhes pa las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi

dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje gur la sogs pa bsgom par rnam par bzhag pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /khyad par du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no/ /mchod rten ni 'dir med do/ /gzhal yas khang gi lte ba

la sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa nyi ma 'char ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan pa sku mdog gser lta bu/ iN+D+ra nI la lta bu'i gtsug phud dang ldan pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma

dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyi steng du sangs rgyas lnga dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ rat+na sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang na bza' sna tshogs bsnams pa/ sgeg pa'i nyams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/ ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po ni rtsa ba dang g.yas

dang nub dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag brgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bu sti dang gzhu dang rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /'dab

ma brgyad pa la seng ge'i steng du gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su gtsug tor chen po dang gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor rnams dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su 'od zer rnam

par 'phro ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags pa dang rgyal ba rnams so/ /gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams ni rdo rje skyil krung dang rin po che'i cod pan can sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis pa'o/ /phyag g.yas pas 'khor lo gyen du bzung ba/ g.yon pas rang gi gdan la mnan pa rnams so/ /

de nas shar gyi re mig gi dbus su glang po che'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po/ zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po bag tsam khro ba dang bcas pa'i rol pa dang ldan pa g.yas pa dkar po kha gdangs pa drag po'o/ /nub kyi ser po dpa' bo g.yon pa dmar po mche bas ma mchu mnan pa phyag

brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /

lho'i re mig gi dbus su rta mchog gi steng du rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang / nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu'o/ g.yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje

dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje tog dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /nub kyi re mig gi dbus su rma bya'i steng du snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal

bzhi'o/ /phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje gsung ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /byang gi

re mig gi dbus su khyung gi steng du don yod grub pa ljang gu zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu mche ba gtsigs pa g.yas ser po zhi ba nub dmar po sgeg pa dang bcas pa/ g.yon dkar po zhi ba phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa

rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang rang gi chibs kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i

gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rat+na sna tshogs dang gos kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po 'di rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa rdo rje dbyings kyi

dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang bzhin can rnams so/ /'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o zhes pa'i phyogs kyang yod do/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ sangs rgyas spyan ma dang ma ma kI dang gos

dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa lta bu'o/ /shar gyi sgo ru rdo rje lcags kyu dmar ser rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ser po

rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pas ga'i stang stabs kyis gnas pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa/ zlum pa'i stang stabs

kyis gnas pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ smar dmar ser dang ldan pa klu chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la/

shar gyi phyogs kyi dbang ldan nas brtsams nas g.yas skor du rim pa bzhin du sa bcu gnyis kyi lha mo rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /de la mos pa spyod pa'i sa ma ni pad+ma bzhin du

dmar ba pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /dri ma med ma dkar mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /'od byed ma dmar mo sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /'od 'phro ma margad lta bu'i mdog ut+pa

la sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /spyang kha ma ser mo pang bar gnas pa'i phyag gan rkyal gyis ma ra ga ta'i nor bu bsnams pa'o/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /ring du song ba ma nam mkha' ltar

sngo bsangs sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba ma ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog lta bu zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga ba dmar pos mtshan pa'i pad+ma'i yu ba 'gying ba dang bcas pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lags pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan pa'i ut+pa

la 'dzin pa'o/ /chos kyi sprin ma ser mo chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu sti 'dzin pa'o/ /kun tu 'od ma nyi ma phyed kyi nyi ma'i mdog can pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par sdogs pa'i byang chub mtshon par byed pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i sku

gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis pa g.yas pa thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o/ /de la rin

po che'i pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dkar dmar gyi mdog can 'bras so ba'i snye ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang bcas pa'i me

tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ma ra ga ta lta bu'i mdog can ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser mdog lta bu yid du 'ong ma pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu sti 'dzin ma/ phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma me tog pri yang ku lta bu ljang gu pad+ma ser po la gnas

pa'i ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma ut+pal sngon po'i mdog can ut+pal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu sti 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo rat+na sna tshogs

pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni sku mdog sna tshogs pa ut+pal sngon po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu dbang bcu ma ni phyag gnyis g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis

snyems pas rang rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /de la tshe la dbang ba ma ni dkar dmar gyi mdog can nor bu pad+ma rA ga la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyis sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /sems la dbang ba ma ni dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa'o/ /yo byad

la dbang ba ma ni ser mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /las la dbang ba ma ni ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /skye ba la dbang ba ma ni sku mdog sna tshogs ma me tog dzA ti kha dog sna tshogs pa'i yal 'dab 'dzin pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ma ni nam mkha'

ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /mos pa la dbang ba ma ni pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba'i pri yang ku'i ma tog gi snyem 'dzin pa'o/ /smon lam la dbang ba ma ni ser mo ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes la dbang ba ma sngon mo ut+pa

la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /chos la dbang ba ma sku mdog dkar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pas pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo rje rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang

chub ma gser gzhu lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yas kyis pad+ma ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du gzugs ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis sna

tshogs rdo rje dang g.yon pa rnams snyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa ste/ de la dbyig gi blo gros ma ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /rin chen skar mda' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma

dkar mo nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /'od zer can dkar dmar skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa'o/ /ri khrod lo ma can ljang gu rma bya'i mjug sgro 'dzin pa'o/ /dgu sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo mtha' yas ma me tog

pri yang ku ltar ljang bu chu skyes dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /tsun+da ma dkar mo bgrang phreng 'phyang ba'i ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /shes rab 'phel ma dkar mo ut+pal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /las

dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ljang gu ste rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dkar dmar 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes mi zad pa'i zla ma tog dmar mo rat+na'i za me tog 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod mo ser mo pad+ma la gnas

pa'i rat+na sna tshogs kyi dpe sgrom 'dzin pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor chos so so yang dag par rig pa ma sku mdog dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor don so so yang dag par rig ma ma ra ka ta'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyi

rin po che'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ma dmar po'i phyag gnyis kyis mtha' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /byang gi sgor spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ma ma ra ka ta lta bu ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje

rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su sgeg mo ser mo sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du phreng ba ma dmar ser phyag gnyis rat+na'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du glu ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang bsgeng

ba'o/ /dbang ldan du gar ma ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis gar byed pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /mos pas spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni rat+na'i rgyan sna tshogs dang gos dang rat+na'i cod pan dang ldan pa dang cung zad 'dzum

pa dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /khyad par du sgo skyong ma rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'o/ /gzhan ni de rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o zhes so/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa

dbang ldan nas brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/ de la shar phyogs kyi snam bu la kun tu bzang po ser po phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin g.yon pas ut+pal la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa ser po g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas mi

'jigs pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /sa'i snying po ser po g.yas pas sa gnon mdzad pa/ g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa'o/ /nam mkha'i snying po ljang gu g.yas pas rat+na sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin

pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi snam bu la nam mkha' mdzod ser po g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas bum pa bzang po la 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag na rin chen ljang gu phyag g.yas pas rin po che dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil

'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po g.yas dung dang g.yon pas rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje snying po ut+pal sngon po'i lo ma lta bu'i mdog can g.yas pas rdo rje dang g.yon pas mdo sde sa bcu pa'i pu ste 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug g.yas pas

mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya g.yon pas chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o/ /mthu chen thob ser po g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /zla 'od dkar po g.yas pas rdo rje 'khor lo dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /dra ba can gyi 'od

dkar dmar g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du 'od dpag med dkar po g.yas na sna tshogs pad+ma dang g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa ser po g.yas pas se gol g.yon pas

pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros gur gum lta bu g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang g.yon pa shak+ti 'dzin pa'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ba dan

'dzin pa'o/ /bcu drug po 'di dag ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa rin po che'i cod pan can rin po che dang na bza' sna tshogs pas brgyan pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa rnams so/ /shar sgor ma he la gshin rje mthar

byed nag po zhal drug pa gsus pa 'phyang ba zhabs drug pa phyag drug gi g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda' 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /zhal dang zhabs rnams kyi bye

brag gong bzhin no/ /lho sgor shes rab mthar byed ser po zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i g.yas gdangs pa/ nub tu drag po chen po g.yon zhi ba yang na 'di rnams ni go rims ji lta bas ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu rnams so/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa

g.yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis snying gar lcags kyu dang rdo rje dril bu dang mdung dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal bzhi dmar ba sgeg pa dang drag po dang bzhad pa dang zhi ba'i nyams dang

ldan pa ni/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams so/ /yang na 'di rnams ni dmar po dang nag po dang ser po dang dkar po rnams so/ /phyag brgyad pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /

g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /gsum po 'di dag ni rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas gnas pa'o/ /byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po zhal bzhi sngon po'am yang na sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu

rnams so/ /phyag brgyad pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje dril bu dang g.yas pa rnams na ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag

po g.yon brkyang bas kun nas mnan nas bzhugs pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba sngon po zhal bzhi sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal khro ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa dang g.yas drag po rgyab dpa' ba g.yon mi sdug pa'o/ /yang na 'di dag sngon po dang

ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams so/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa thugs kar bzung nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang / gzhu

'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon brkyang ba'i stang stabs kyis zhabs g.yon pas dbang phyug chen po'i mgo mnan pa g.yas pas u ma'i nu mar mnan pa'o/ /mer rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nag po sgeg pa dang dpa' ba dang 'jigs su rung ba dang / snying rje'i ro dang ldan pa'i zhal bzhi nag po

'am yang na 'di dag ni sngon po dkar po ser po dmar po rnams so/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga la 'brel pa'i ba dan 'dzin pa'o/ /chung ma dang

bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g.yas brkyang gis mnan pa'o/ /bden bral du he ru ka rdo rje sngon po sngon po'i zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal drag po g.yas pa rab tu dga' bas bzhad pa rgyab ni za bar rngams pa g.yon pa sgeg pa'o/ /yang na 'di dag ni sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar

po'o/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang mda' dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis snying gar pad+ma kha bye ba dang / gzhu dang dril bu dang ba dan dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag gnyis kyis 'jigs byed kyi pags pa

rlung gi gos 'dra ba 'dzin pa'o/ /chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa g.yon brkyang bas mnan nas gnas pa'o/ /rlung du rta mchog ljang gu ljang gu'i zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba khro bo dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa g.yas pa drag po g.yon pa'i zhal tshangs pa lta bu ste/ yang na ni 'di ni ljang gu dang

sngon po dang dkar po rnams te/ spyi bor rta mgo ljang gu'o/ /'di ni phyag brgyad pa g.yas dang po sna tshogs rdo rje dang ba dan gsum pa dang ldan pas phyag bsgreng ba'i tshul byas pa gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa'i tshul byas pa/ phyag gnyis kyis ral gri dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /

g.yon pas phub dang bcas pa'i phyag gi sna tshogs chu skyes 'dzin pa/ lhag ma gsum gyis shaka ti dang dbyug pa dang gzhu rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /zhabs g.yon bskum pa g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs bzhi'o/ /g.yas dang

po gcig gis dbang mo dang dpal mo/ gnyis pas dga' mo dang tshim mo/ g.yon pa gcig gis dbang po dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang / dpyid kyi lha mnan nas gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i steng du nam mkha' la gtsug tor

'khor los sgyur ba ser po zhal bzhi ser ba'am yang na ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o/ /phyag brgyad pa'i g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu bsnams

pa/ rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas gnas pa'o/ /'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag po zhal bzhi pa drag po dang zhi ba dang / bzhad pa dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i nag po'o/ /yang na zhal bzhi ni nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po'o/ /phyag brgyad pa'i g.yas

pa rnams ni rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa gsal shing rtse gcig pa dang gzhu rnams 'dzin pa g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o/ /khro bo bcu po 'di dag ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa zhal re re zhing spyan gsum

gsum dmar ba smin ma 'khyog pa stag gi pags pas sku'i stod smad la dkris pa thod pa'i phreng bas gtsug tor byas pa dbu skra 'bar ba dmar ser gyen du bcings pa sma ra dmar ser dang ldan pa klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis 'jigs su rung ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa kho

na'i grwa bzhi'i nang na 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa khro bo bzhi'i phyi'i re khA'i phyi rol gyi gnas su me la sogs pa'i zur thig bzhi po rnams kyi g.yas logs su me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /g.yon logs su gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /

de la me tog ma ser mo phyag na me tog gi snod 'dzin pa'o/ /bdug spos ma nag mo phyag na bdug spos kyi phor pa 'dzin pa'o/ /mar me ma dmar mo phyag na rat+na'i sgron me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o/ /dri chab ma ljang gu phyag na dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gzugs ma ser

mo phyag na me long 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje sgra ma ljang gu phyag na pi wang 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje ro ma dmar mo phyag na ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje reg bya ma sna tshogs pa'i kha dog can phyag na gos sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma rat+na'i cod pan

dang ldan pa gos sna tshogs dang rin po ches brgyan pa pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /bzhi pa rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang po'i phyogs su dbang po ser po glang po che sa srung dkar po'i steng na gnas pa phyag g.yas na rdo rje

g.yon pa nu ma 'dzin pa'o/ /gshin rjer ma he la gshin rje nag po phyag gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang rtse gcig pa 'dzin pa'o/ /chur chu srin la chu bdag dkar po sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka bdun pa klu'i zhags pa dang dung dkar 'dzin pa'o/ /lus ngan du mi la lus ngan ser po

lcags kyu dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du dbang ldan dkar po glang gi steng na gnas pa rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa thod pa dang ral pa'i thor cog dang zla ba phyed pas dbu brgyan pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa mgrin pa sngon po'o/ /mer ra la me lha

dmar po blugs gzar dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du srin po'i bdag po sngon po rol gnas pa ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du rlung lha sngon po ri dwags la gnas pa rlung ras 'dzin pa'o/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas pas phyag

mtshan dang po 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas phyag mtshan gnyis 'dzin cing rang rang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa phyag 'og ma gnyis gtso bo la 'dud pa'i tshul gyis spyi bor thal mo sbyor ba'o/ /dbang ldan dang nye ba'i phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas rim pas

tshangs pa la sogs pa ste de la tshangs pa ni ngang pa la zhon pa ser po zhal bzhi ni ser po'o/ /phyag bzhi pa dang po gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'og ma gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang spyi blugs bzung nas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /khyab 'jug nag

po khyung la zhon pa phyag bzhi pa dang po gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mdung thung dang sa raM kha'i gzhu 'dzin pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /dbang phyug chen po dkar po glang la zhon pa ral pa'i thor cog can zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa/ phyag bzhi pa

spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba dang rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gdong drug dmar po rma bya la zhon pa gdong drug pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa gnyis sha ka ti dang rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lhag ma gnyis kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /'di

rnams kyang gong bzhin du rang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /tshangs ma ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa'o/ /drag mo ni drag po dang mtshungs pa'o/ /khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug dang mtshungs pa'o/ /gzhon du ma ni gdong drug dang mtshungs pa'o/ /dbang mo ni dbang po dang mtshungs pa'o/ /

phag mo nag mo ni 'ug pa la zhon pa phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis ro hi ta'i nya dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gzhan gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /tsa muN+DI dmar mo ri dwags la zhon pa phyag bzhi ma g.yas g.yon gyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /

b+h+r-ing+gi ri ti nag mo shin tu skem pa phyag bzhi pa gnyis kyis phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /tshogs bdag dkar po byi ba la zhon pa glang po che'i gdong can sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can phyag bzhi'i g.yas gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa dang la du g.yon

gnyis kyis dgra sta dang la phug 'dzin pa'o/ /nag po chen po nag po rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dga' byed dbang phyug nag po rdza rnga la zhon pa rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa'o/ /nyi ma dmar po rta bdun gyis 'dren pa'i shing rta la zhon pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis

pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /zla ba dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pas ku mu da la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /mig dmar dmar por la zhon pa g.yas na gri gug g.yon pas mi mgo za ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin

pa'o/ /lhag pa ser po pad+ma'i steng du mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /phur bu dkar po thod pa'am sbal ba la zhon pa phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /pa ba sangs dkar po pad+ma la gnas pa phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /spen pa nag po rus sbal la gnas pa dbyug pa 'dzin

pa'o/ /sgra gcan dmar nag phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /mjug rings nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /stobs bzangs dkar po glang po la gnas pa ral gri dang gshol 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyal bar byed pa ljang gu bya ko ki la'i shing rta la zhon pa ljang

gu phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis na me tog gi phreng ba dang mda' g.yon gnyis kyis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /sbrang rtsir byed pa dkar po ne tso'i shing rta la gnas pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang mda' g.yon pa gnyis na btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /

dpyid kyi lha dkar po spre'u la gnas pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis mda' dang ral gri g.yon pa gnyis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /klu mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang 'jog po dang stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang dung skyong dang rigs ldan rnams

sbrul mgo bdun dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /yang na rang rang gi yab kyi g.yas pa'i phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /thags bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang tshim byed dang / rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po chen po

rnams mdog nag po g.yul 'gyed pa'i go cha sna tshogs bgos pa ral gri dang phe ta ka la sogs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag gis 'dzin pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gshog pa brkyang ba pus mo'i bar du dkar po de'i steng du lte ba'i bar du ser po de'i steng du

mgrin pa'i bar du dmar po/ /de'i steng du mgo'i bar du nag po phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa ser po phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi sgra sgrogs

pa'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po don kun grub pa dkar po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /gang ba bzang po sngon po/ nor bu bzang po ser po/ nor sbyin dmar po/ rnam thos kyi bu ser po/ pi tsi kuN+Da li dmar po/ ki li ma lI ljang gu/ sgo'i dbang po ser po/ spyod

pa'i dbang po ser po ste/ gang ba bzang po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi bdag po 'di dag ni phyag gnyis kyi g.yas kyis shing thog pi dza pU ra dang g.yon ne'u le 'dzin pa'o/ /'phrog ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis zan gyi chang bu gnyis 'dzin pa bu dang bcas pa'o/ /tha skar dkar po dang /

bra nye ljang gu dang / smin drug sngo bsangs dang / snar ma dmar skya dang / mgo nag po dang / lag ser po dang / na ba so sor po dang / rgyal sngo bsangs dang / skag dkar po dang / mchu ser po dang / gre me tog bri yang ku lta bu ljang ser dang / spo ljang gu dang / me bzhi dkar

po dang / nag pa ljang gu dang / sa ri ser po dang / sa gnag po dang / lha mtshams ljang gu dang / snon ser po dang / snubs ser po dang / chu stod nag po dang / chu smad dkar po dang / gro bzhin dkar ser dang / mon gre nag po dang / mon gru ser po dang / khrums stod ljang gu dang /

khrums smad ser po dang / nam gru dkar ser dang / byi bzhin sngo bsangs so/ /tha skar la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams ni stod g.yogs g.yo ba dang bcas pa rnams thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gzhan yang lha rnams ni shing rta la gnas par shes par bya'o/ /dbang po la sogs pa'i lha

rnams pad+ma la gnas pa re re la'ang 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor pa'o/ /sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che dang gos sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra phyogs thams cad du sgrogs

ba'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i sgo skyong rnams ni nang gi dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i bdag nyid 'jam pa'i dbyangs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang

bzhin la bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o/ /me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang gtsug tor brgyad dang / spyan ma la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs

pa bzhi dang mA ma kI dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang sa bcu gnyis dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa ma dang / sgeg mo dang kun du bzang po la sogs pa bzhi dang / khro bo bcu dang me tog ma dang / rdo rje gzugs ma dang shar phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la mi bskyod pas so/ /rdo rje

rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa dang / pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis dang don so so yang dag par rig pa ma dang phreng ba ma dang nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa bzhi dang / bdug spos ma dang rdo rje sgra ma dang lho'i phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan

gyis so/ /rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang gos dkar mo dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang tshe la dbang ba ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ma dang glu ma dang spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa bzhi dang / mar me ma dang rdo rje ro ma dang /

nub phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'od dpag med kyis so/ /rdo rje las la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / gzungs bcu gnyis dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ma dang / gar ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang dri chab ma dang rdo rje reg bya ma

dang / byang phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni muH'o/ /a A sarba ta tha ga ta hr-i da ya ha ra ha ra oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mUrti wA gI shwa ra mahA wA tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma

d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHzhes bya ba ni snying po'i sngags so/ /oM a mri ta kuN+Da li bag+h+nA n+ta ka hUM zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang ri rab kyi

steng du gzhal yas khang gi dbus su nang gi dkyil 'khor la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ser po/ rdo rje phreng ba sngon pos bskor ba ste/ 'ga' zhig tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sngon por gsungs so/ /gzhan ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po shar gyi rtsibs dkar po lho nag po

nub dmar po byang ljang gu'o zhes gsungs so/ /'khor lo'i lte ba la sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge rnam par snang mdzad chen po shin tu gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug

tor dkar pos gnon gyi phyag rgya can no/ /lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma gtsug tor dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya can no/ /byang gi rtsibs la sna tshogs gtsug tor ljang gu mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'i

phyag rgya'o/ /me'i rtsibs la gtsug tor gzi brjid sku mdog dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma 'dzin pa phyag g.yon pa dkur brten pa'o/ /bden bral gyi rtsibs la gtsug tor rgyal mtshan sku mdog dmar nag 'dres pas phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan

'dzin pa'o/ /rlung gi rtsibs la gtsug tor rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yas pas ral gri 'dzin pa g.yon pas po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis gdugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol

me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang phreng ba ma dang glu ma dang gar ma rnams sku mdog dkar mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang sna tshogs can ma phyag gnyis pa'o/ /snam bu la sgo'i g.yon logs su byang chub sems dpa' gnyis dang g.yas logs su gnyis so/ /de la shar

gyi snam bu la byams pa ser po/ g.yas pa'i phyag gis klu shing gi me tog dang / g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /mthong ba don yod ser po phyag g.yas pas spyan dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /ngan song kun 'dren dkar po

phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas dbyug pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi snam bu la spos kyi glang po dkar ljang g.yas kyis dri'i dung

phor 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba dkar po g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /nam mkha' mdzod dkar ser g.yas pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /ye shes

tog sngon po phyag g.yas kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /nub kyi snam bu la bdud rtsi'i 'od dkar po g.yas pas cod pan gyi steng du bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /zla ba'i 'od

dkar po g.yas pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /bzang skyong dkar po g.yas pas rin po che 'bar ba dang bcas pa 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g.yas pas rdo rje'i gur 'dzin pa/ g.yon

pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /byang gi snam bu la rdo rje snying po sngo skya g.yas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa dkar po phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /spobs pa brtsegs

pa dmar po g.yas pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i rat+na brtsegs pa bsnams pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas pas rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa g.yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs

pa rnams la me tog ma dang bdug spos ma dang mar me ma dang / dri chab ma rnams ni dkar mo dang nag mo dang dmar mo dang / ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis me tog la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin

pa'o/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lha sum cu so bdun po 'di dag

kyang gos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rat+na'i cod pan can zhal gcig spyan gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni rang nyid dang mtshungs pa'i rnam snang

gis rgyas btab po/ /rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad chen pos so/ /shar gyi phyogs dang me'i mtshams na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so/ /lho phyogs dang bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la rin chen gtsug tor

gyis so/ /nub phyogs dang rlung gi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la pad+ma gtsug tor gyis so/ /byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so/ /'dir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas kyi snam bu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi

shu rtsa brgyad po lta'o zhes rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir 'dod yon gyi snam bu rnams la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod par mi rigs so/ /'ga' zhig ni nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud du gsungs pas phyi rol gyi gzhal yas khang gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa'o zhes

smra'o/ /'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgu gtsug tor dang bcas pa dge slong gi cha lugs 'dzin par gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba dang / khor yug gi nang du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas

g.yas skor gyis mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa bskyed par bya ste/ /de la dbang ldan du glang la mgrin pa sngon po dkar po mchod phyir thogs pa can phyag g.yas gnyis na rdo rje dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya g.yon gnyis na rtse gsum dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /mgrin sngon ma mgrin

pa sngon po lta bu'o/ /nam mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po g.yas gnyis na dbyug tho dang rdo rje g.yon gnyis na dung dang 'khor lo'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu khyad par gser gyi mdog can no/ /rma bya la rdo rje dril bu zhal drug pa dmar ba g.yas pa gnyis na

shaka ti dang rdo rje g.yon pa gnyis na khyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o/ /ngang pa la mi smra rdo rje ser po zhal bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang sngags bzla ba'i phreng ba g.yon pa gnyis na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs so/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma tshangs pa lta bu'o/ /

glang po che mche ba drug pa'i dbang po dkar po dang zla ba la rdo rje mtshon cha dkar po rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas gnas pa phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa g.yon pas rdo rje rtse gsum dkur brten pa'o/ /lha mo rdo rje khu tshur ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha ji lta bu'o/ /rta bdun gyi shing rta la rdo rje 'khyil

ba dmar po khros pa g.yas pa na pad+ma g.yon pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa bzhin no/ /ngang pa la rdo rje 'od dkar po khro bo phyag g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mdog ma rdo rje 'od lta bu'o/ /ra la rdo rje

dmar ser khro bo g.yas kyis rdo rje dmar po 'dzin cing g.yon pas mi bzung nas za ba'i tshul lo/ /rdo rje ske rags ma rdo rje dmar ser bzhin no/ /pad+ma la rdo rje zhi ba khro bo ser po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma rdo rje zhi ba bzhin no/ /sbal pa la rdo rje bla ma khro bo ser po g.yas

bgrang phreng dang g.yon spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bla ma ma rdo rje bla ma bzhin no/ /pad+ma la rdo rje pa wa sangs khro bo dkar po g.yas na bgrang phreng dang g.yon na spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje pa wa sangs ma rdo rje pa wa sangs bzhin no/ /rus sbal la rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo nag po g.yas pa

na rdo rje g.yon pa na dbyug pa'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa ma ni rdo rje dbyug pa dang 'dra ba'o/ /rdo rje sgra gcan khro bo ma dmar nag g.yas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang g.yon pa nyi ma 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje lha min ma ni rdo rje sgra gcan dang 'dra ba'o/ /rdo rje mjug rings khro bo mdog

nag po g.yas pas ral gri g.yon pas sprul zhags 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje glu ma rdo rje mjug rings bzhin no/ /bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi ba la sogs pa rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar bdag gis bris so/ /glang po che la rdo rje glang sna dkar po g.yas rdo rje g.yon pas gshol

'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna bzhin no/ /de'i khyad par ni g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /bya ko ki la'i shing rta la rdo rje phreng ba can ljang gu g.yas pa na rdo rje g.yon pa na me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje brtan ma rdo rje phreng ba ji lta ba las khyad par ni phyag g.yon pa na

mdung ngo / /ne tso'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang can ser po g.yas na rdo rje g.yon pa na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can dang 'dra ba'o/ /khyad par ni sku mdog dmar ba'o/ /sbal pa la rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dkar po rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje

gdan ma rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dang 'dra ba'o/ /me tog la rdo rje gtun shing ser po g.yas g.yon gyis rdo rje gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu'o/ /khyad par ni g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /ral rdo rje me dmar po g.yas gnyis kyis rdo rje dang

go cha g.yon gnyis dbyug to dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ma rdo rje me lta bu'o/ /ma he la rdo rje nag po sku mdog nag po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /ro langs la rdo rje nag mo sku mdog nag mo rdo rje dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /lhag par klu la rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po phag

pa'i zhal rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /mi la rdo rje gdong ma sngon mo phag gdong rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /chu srin la rdo rje klu dkar po sbrul mgo brgyad dang ldan pa g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas klu'i zhags pa'o/ /chu srin la chu srin ma dkar mo sbrul mgo brgyad dang ldan

pa g.yas pas rdo rje dang g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o/ /ri dwags la rdo rje rlung sngon po g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas rlung sgrib pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs can ma rdo rje rlung lta bu'o/ /ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon po rdo rje dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o/ /

rdo rje rnam par gtsigs ma rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu'o/ /khyad par ni g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byi ba la rdo rje log 'dren dkar po glang po che'i zhal phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dgra sta g.yon pa gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa dang / dbyug to 'dzin pa sprul gyi mchod phyir

thogs pa'o/ /bra ba byi ba la sbrul mo sngon mo g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas phyags shing 'dzin pa'o/ /bsdigs ma ljang gu g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas ral gri'i bye brag phe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mo sku mdog ser mo g.yas pas rdo rje g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa/

dbyangs can ma dkar mo g.yas na rdo rje g.yon pa ni pi wang 'dzin pa'o/ seng ge la bgrod dka' ma ljang gu phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang tsakra g.yon pa gnyis na lde mig dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i lha 'di dag gi phyag g.yas pa

rnams na ji ltar rigs par rdo rje rtse gsum par rig par bya'o/ /nub tu rdo rje klu dang nye bar pad+ma la gnas pa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /lha ma yin rnams ni sku mdog sna tshogs pa go cha sna tshogs pa bgos

nas ral gri 'dzin pa ras bal gyi gdan 'jam pa la gnas pa'o/ /klu rnams ni nor bu dang ldan pa'i gdengs ka can btsun mo dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /khor yug gi phyi rol du me'i mtshams su mnar med pa'i dmyal ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /bden bral gyi mtshams

su yi dwags rnams so/ /rlung gi mtshams su dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams so/ /dbang ldan du mi'i 'gro ba rnams so/ /rim pa bzhin 'di ni rgyud gzhan gyi tshul gyis bris so/ /gzhan ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang nye bar sa'i lha mo dang gnod sbyin rnams so/ /rdo rje nag mo dang

nye bar lha ma yin rnams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par byed do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i thugs kar zla ba la oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu ne ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dgod do/ /de nyid ni snying po'i sngags so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba durga ti ba

ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shu d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni phreng ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags/ oM sarba bid sarba a pA ya ga ti ga ha na bi sho d+ha

ni hUM hoHphaT ces bya ba ni las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes gzhan dag go/ /'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte ba'i dbus su gzhal yas khang gi lte ba

la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng ngam de med kyang rung ste sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa ral pa'i thor cog can sma ra dmar ser thod pa lnga dang ldan pa mig gsum pa mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung

ba gsus pa 'phyang ba sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can stag gi pags pas phyed dkris pa lag pa bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis gri gug dang Da ma ru g.yon pa gnyis kyis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa drag po/ g.yon brkyang gis mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'byung po 'dul

byed drag po chen po sku mdog sngon po thod pa lngas mtshan pa'i cod pan la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar bas bcings pa gos sngon po gon pa zhal mche ba gtsigs pa spyan gsum dmar ba sgeg pa'i gad mo mdzad pa/ phyag bzhi pa'i g.yas

pas rdo rje sngon po 'jigs pa gsor zhing g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa phyag gnyis kyis phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /phyag rgya ni srin lag gnyis bsnol nas mdzub mo gnyis bskum par bya'o/ /mthe chung dang gung mo yang mthe bong rgan pos mnan par

bya'o zhes pa 'di gsungs so/ /klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste de la karko Ta sngon pos dbu skra bcings pa/ 'jog po dmar pos mgul rgyan byas pa/ dga' bo dang nyer dga' bo ser pos rna ba brgyan pa ser po gcig pas gcig tu bgrang ngo / /mtha' yas dkar

pos tshangs skud/ nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags/ phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag gnyis kyis dpung par rigs ldan phug ron gyi mdog lta bus brgyan pa/ dung skyong dkar pos phyag gzhan gnyis kyis dpung pa la brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dmar pos rkang gdub byas pa'o/ /

mdog gcig pas gcig nyid do/ /shar phyogs kyi re mig la glang dang nyi ma la dbang phyug chen po mtshan ma gyen du langs la thod pa can thal ba'i mdog spyan gsum pa zla ba phyed kyis mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyag bzhi pa phyag

g.yas pa gnyis kyis gri gug dang Da ma ru 'dzin pa g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang rtse gsum pa'o/ /lho ru nam mkha' lding gi steng du nyi ma la khyab 'jug nag po cod pan dmar po can/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis rnga yab dang dung 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang

dbyug to 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu ngang pa dang zla ba'i steng du tshangs pa dkar po zhal bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang gdugs kyi yu ba 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis pad+ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du rma bya dang nyi ma'i steng du smin drug gi bu dmar po gtsug phud gsum dang

ldan pa g.yas pas rnga yab g.yon pas shaka ti 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du bra ba byi ba dang zla ba la tshogs bdag dkar po glang po che'i zhal spyan gsum pa spyi bor zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa phyag g.yas pa gnyis na la phug dang dgra sta g.yon gnyis na rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /

mer nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma dmar po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis mtsho skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du shing rta'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sgra gcan dmar nag dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa smin ma dang mig dang sma ra

dmar ser 'bar ba mche ba bzhi pa zhal gdangs pa g.yas g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma dang zla bar bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /rlung du zla ba'i steng du dga' byed dbang phyug ser po gar byed cing spyi bor zla ba phyed pa can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/

g.yas pa dang cig shos dag gis Da ma ru dang rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la shar gyi phyogs su zla ba la dpal mo dkar mo thugs kar thal mo sbyar bas me tog pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lho'i phyogs su zla ba la thig le mchog ma dmar mo gar byed cing spos snod 'dzin pa'o/ /

nub tu zla ba la zla ba mo dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du zla ba la dka' bzlog ma ser mo gdengs ka'i lag pa bzlog nas spyi bor bzhag nas gar byed pa'o/ /mer zla ba la rin chen dpal mo dmar mo dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du zla ba la dbyangs can ma ljang gu pi wang

gi sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /rlung du zla ba la lha mdzes ma nag mo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du zla ba la dbang po 'byor ma ser mo gar byed ma phyag na rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i shar du glang pos srung dkar po dang zla ba la brgya byin ser po mig stong dang

ldan pa rin po che'i cod pan can phyag g.yas pa skyabs sbyin g.yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor ma he dang nyi ma la gshin rje nag po gsus pa 'phyang ba spyan gsum dang smin ma dang smar dang ral pa dmar ser can na bza' ser po mnabs pa phyag g.yas pas thod pas mtshan

pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu sbrul dang zla ba la chu lha dkar po sbrul gyi gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yon pas sbrul gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang

du gnod sbyin gyi steng du lus ngan po ser po sha rgyas shing gsus pa 'phyang ba rin po che'i cod pan can g.yas ba dang g.yon pa gnyis kyis dbyug to dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o/ /mer ra dang nyi ma la me lha dmar po ral pa gsum dang ldan pa skra dang smar ser zhing 'bar ba gsus pa 'phyang

ba phrag pa la phyag tshang ku ba btags pa mchod phyir thogs pa can g.yas pa gnyis kyis mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa g.yon pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa rtse gsum pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ro langs dang nyi ma la srin po nag po/ smin ma nag po dang / sma ra

dmar ser 'bar ba dang ldan pa phyag g.yas kyis ral gri dang g.yon gyis mi shas gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du ri dwags dang zla ba la rlung lha sngon po gtsug phud gsum dang ldan pa phyag gnyis kyis rlung ras 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ngang pa dang zla ba la zla ba dkar po g.yas

pas ku mu da la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor g.yon pas mchog sbyin no/ /dbang ldan yang dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o/ /rim pa bzhi pa'i shar du zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dkar mo seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor zla ba la gnas pa'i rnam par rgyal

ma dmar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu zla ba la pad ldan ma chen mo dkar mo gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du zla ba la chang 'phrog ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du zla ba la mchog 'phrog ma ser mo thugs kar me tog dang bcas pa'i

thal mo kha sbyor ba'o/ /mer zla ba la rin chen dbang phyug ma ser mo spos phor 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du zla ba la rgyan ma ser mo dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du zla ba la 'gro skyong ma ser mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir gang la khyad par gyi tshig med pa de rnams la

nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /lha thams cad sems dpa'i skyil krung can gos dang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'dir dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo / /hUM badzra phaT ces

pa ni snying po'o/ /yang na oM b+hUM ha Da ma ra b+hU ta ad+hi pa ti ak+Sho b+h+ya kI rI Ti na sarba b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsa na sa d+hA ya hUM phaT ces bya ba ni las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang de nyid do/ /yang na bgegs mthar byed kyis so// //mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor la/ rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa

nas bzung nas gzhal yas khang gi bar du sngar gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gau rI la sogs pa rnams dang /

dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su puk+ka sI la sogs pa'o/ /de la gau rI dkar mo g.yas pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /tsau rI dmar mo zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /be tA lI dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /g+ha sma rI ljang gu rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /

puk+ka sI sngon mo phyag na byang chub sems kyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /sha ba rI dkar mo ri rab 'dzin pa'o/ /tsaN+Da lI sngon mo me thab 'dzin pa'o/ /DoM bi nI sku mdog sna tshogs ma rgyal mtshan chen po'i ba dan 'dzin pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su zla ba'i steng du sangs rgyas mkha'

'gro dkar po ste/ rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g.yon pa dmar po gzhan thams cad sngon po'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag brgyad kyi thod pa na rma bya dang ma he dang / chu srin dang nya dang rgyal po dang rus sbal dang / lhag pa'i klu dang ngang pa rnams so/ /g.yon pa brgyad kyi thod pa rnams ni dpyid dang

srog chags dz+yeSh+Tha dang sbrul ha la ha la dang a dza nA b+h+yo dang byi ba dang g.yag dang dri can dang co ga rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su rim pa bzhin du skam pa mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so/ /de la skam pa mo sngon mo phyag g.yas pa na skam pa

'dzin pa/ zhags ldan ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dol zlum ma dmar mo nya rgya zlum po 'dzin pa'o/ /lcags kyu ma ljang gu lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /me tog ma dkar mo me tog gi za ma tog 'dzin pa'o/ /bdug spos ma nag mo spos phor 'dzin pa'o/ /mar me ma ser

mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o/ /dri chab ma ser mo dri ser pos bkang ba'i dung 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rin chen mkha' 'gro ser po ste/ 'di'i rtsa ba dang g.yon pa gnyis ser po dang dkar po lhag ma rnams ni sngon po/ g.yas pa'i thod

pa rnams na bya ka raN+Da/ ngur pa dang lug dang bya tsa ko ra dang khra dang hor pa dang 'ol ba dang bya ku ra'o/ /g.yon pa rnams na stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang rigs ldan dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang / 'jog po dang nor rgyas dang mtha' yas rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang

dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su lha mo rnams te/ de la nyi phyag ma dkar mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /mar me ma sngon mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa'o/ /rin chen dkar mda' ma ser mo rin po che 'dzin pa'o/ /glog phyag ma ljang gu glog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /

sgeg mo dmar mo snyems pa dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /phreng ba ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /klu ma dmar skya phyag gnyis kyis ting ting shag 'dzin pa'o/ /gar ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas

pas gar byed pa'o/ /nub kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar po ste/ 'di'i rtsa ba'i zhal dang g.yon pa ni dmar po dang dkar po dang lhag ma rnams ni nag po'o/ /phyag g.yas pa'i thod pa rnams na dom dang bya rgod dang / bse dang ba man dang stag dang

spre'u dang / chu srin nA kra dang ce spyang rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams na khwa dang 'ug pa dang so bya dang seng ge dang bya sa ra sa dang ra dang ri dwags dang phag pa rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams la lha mo rnams so/ /de la shar phyogs su pad+ma

dkar po pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /chos 'byung ma ser mo chos 'byung 'dzin pa'o/ /lcags sgrog ma nag mo phyag gnyis kyis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /rang 'khyud ma ljang gu sangs rgyas thams cad la rjes su chags pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang thod pa bzung bas rang la 'khyud pa'o/ /gling bu ma

dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis gling bu bzung nas sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /pi wang ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang bsgreng ba la brtson pa'o/ /mu kuN+Da ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis rnga bo che brdung ba'o/ /rdza rnga ma du ba'i mdog can phyag gnyis kyis rdza rnga brdung ba'o/ /byang gi gzhal yas khang gi

dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dUr ba ltar ljang gu ste/ de'i rtsa ba'i zhal ni rta'i gdong ljang gu'o/ /gzhan rnams lha'i zhal lo/ /phyogs gcig la rtsa ba'i zhal yang lha'i zhal lo/ /g.yon pa dkar po lhag ma rnams nag po'o/ /phyag g.yas pa'i thod pa rnams

na gza' lag pa dang phur bu dang mjug rings dang sgra gcan 'dzin dang mig dmar dang pa wa sangs dang spen pa dang khyab 'jug rnams so/ /g.yon pa rnams la dbang po dang chu lha dang tshangs pa dang drag po dang 'dod pa'i lha dang stobs bzangs dang thags bzangs ris dang stobs can rnams so/ /

shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs par lha mo rnams so/ /de la sgo lcags ma dkar mo ni sgo lcags 'dzin pa'o/ /lde kyog ma ser mo lde kyog 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo glegs ma dmar mo sgo glegs 'dzin pa'o/ /yol ba 'dzin ma nag mo phyag gnyis kyis yol ba 'dzin

pa'o/ /spyan ma dkar mo 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /mA ma kI sngon mo rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /gos dkar mo dmar mo phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /sgrol ma ljang gu phyag na ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su gau rI la sogs pa dang puk+ka

sI la sogs pa ste sngar bzhin no/ /'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni gdan dang mdog dang dbyibs dang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rnams ni he ru ka lha dgu'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor la ji ltar phyag bcu drug pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang 'khyud pa'i yum bdag med ma yang de bzhin no/ /'khor lo'i

mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi po 'di ni bshad pa'i khyad par rnams las khyad par gzhan rnams ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de nas 'khyud pa'i lha mo rnams ni go rims ji lta bar spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams ni dkar mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang ljang gu ste

gri gug dang sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis pa rnams so/ /mkha' 'gro ma lnga po rnams kyang re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan can no/ /gzhal yas khang gi lha mo rnams ni gcer bu spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa mche ba gtsigs pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa dbu skra

'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa dpral ba'i dbyes la thod pa lnga dang mi mgo skam po'i do shal dang phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma dang ro dang nyi ma rnams la g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gi gar gyis gnas pa'o/ /gang khyad par ma bshad pa rnams ni g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub snying

gar 'dzin pas sdigs par mdzad do/ /'khyud pa'i lha mo rnams la ni gdan tha dad pa med do/ /gau rI la sogs pa brgyad la rim pa bzhin du ro'i gdan gyi gnas su tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang / drag po dang gshin rje dang / lus ngan po dang srin po dang / thags bzangs ris

rnams zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gau rI la sogs pa rnams rdo rje mkha' 'gro la zhal mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /lha gzhan rnams ni rang rang gi bdag po la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /dgyes pa rdo rje'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rdo rje'o/ /sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la/

thugs dang / rtag pa dang / rin 'byung dang / 'od dpag med rnams so/ /rtag pa'i spyi bor 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang 'khor lo'o/ /sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la thugs dang / rin 'byung dang 'od dpag med dang / don yod grub pa rnams so/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i spyi bor rin 'byung dang yid bzhin

nor bu'o/ /de'i sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyi ni sku dang thugs dang / 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi spyi bor pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje pad+ma'o/ /de'i sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyi ni sku rdo rje dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang mi bskyod pa dang tshe
